trans-unit.source: Returns a bool indicating whether this typemap is entirely empty.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个bool,表示该类型映射是否完全为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean as to whether or not warnings are enabled for the warning category w. If the category is by default enabled even if not within the scope of use warnings, instead use the "ckWARN_d" macro.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关是否为警告类别 w 启用警告的布尔值。如果类是默认启用的，即使未范围内 use warnings ，而是使用“ckWARN_d”宏。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether Perl would evaluate the SV as true or false. See "SvOK" for a defined/undefined test. Does not handle 'get' magic.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示Perl将SV评估为true还是false。有关已定义/未定义的测试，请参见 "SvOK" 。不处理“获取”魔法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether Perl would evaluate the SV as true or false. See "SvOK" for a defined/undefined test. Handles 'get' magic unless the scalar is already SvPOK, SvIOK or SvNOK (the public, not the private flags).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示Perl将SV评估为true还是false。有关已定义/未定义的测试，请参见 "SvOK" 。除非标量已经是 SvPOK ， SvIOK 或 SvNOK （公共标志，而不是私有标志），否则处理“获取”魔术。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether Perl would evaluate the SV as true or false. See SvOK() for a defined/undefined test. Does not handle 'get' magic.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示Perl是否将SV评估为真或假。参见 SvOK()以了解定义/未定义的测试。不处理 "get "魔法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether Perl would evaluate the SV as true or false. See SvOK() for a defined/undefined test. Handles 'get' magic unless the scalar is already SvPOK, SvIOK or SvNOK (the public, not the private flags).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示Perl是否将SV评估为真或假。参见 SvOK()以了解定义/未定义的测试。除非标量已经是 SvPOK,SvIOK 或 SvNOK (公共的,而不是私有的标志),否则处理 'get' 魔术。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether or not this module can actually generate colored output. This will be false if it could not load the modules needed for the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示该模块是否能实际生成彩色输出。如果不能加载当前平台所需的模块,则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV (or the one it references) is a REGEXP.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示SV(或其引用的SV)是否为REGEXP的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV contains a signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示SV是否包含一个带符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV contains a v-string.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示SV是否包含v-string的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV contains an integer that must be interpreted as unsigned. A non-negative integer whose value is within the range of both an IV and a UV may be be flagged as either SvUOK or SVIOK.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示SV是否包含一个必须被解释为无符号的整数。一个非负整数,其值在IV和UV的范围内,可以标记为SvUOK或SVIOK。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV contains an integer that must be interpreted as unsigned. A non-negative integer whose value is within the range of both an IV and a UV may be flagged as either SvUOK or SvIOK.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示SV是否包含必须解释为无符号的整数。可以将其值同时位于IV和UV范围内的非负整数标记为 SvUOK 或 SvIOK 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV is Copy-On-Write shared hash key scalar.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示SV是否为Copy-On-Write共享哈希键标量的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV is an RV pointing to a blessed object. If the SV is not an RV, or if the object is not blessed, then this will return false.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示SV是否是指向被祝福对象的RV,如果SV不是RV,或者对象没有被祝福,则返回false。如果SV不是RV,或者如果对象没有被祝福,那么将返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV is an object reference and is derived from the specified class, respecting any isa() method overloading it may have. Returns false if sv is not a reference to an object, or is not derived from the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该布尔值表示SV是否是对象引用，并且是从指定的类派生的，并考虑到它可能具有的任何 isa() 方法重载。如果 sv 不是对对象的引用，或者不是从指定的类派生的，则返回false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV is blessed into the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示SV是否被祝福到指定类的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV is blessed into the specified class. This does not check for subtypes; use sv_derived_from to verify an inheritance relationship.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示SV是否被祝福进入指定的类。这不检查子类型。使用 sv_derived_from 验证继承关系。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV is derived from the specified class
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示SV是否从指定的类派生。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the SV performs a specific, named role. The SV can be a Perl object or the name of a Perl class.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示SV是否执行了一个特定的、命名的角色。SV可以是一个Perl对象或一个Perl类的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the package (if provided) or any package (otherwise) is eligible for indexing by PAUSE, the Perl Authors Upload Server. Note This only checks for valid package declarations, and does not take any ownership information into account.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示该软件包（如果提供）或任何软件包（否则）是否符合通过PAUSE（Perl作者上传服务器）进行索引的条件。注意这仅检查有效的 package 声明，而不考虑任何所有权信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character can be the first character of an identifier. This is very close to, but not quite the same as the official Unicode property XID_Start . The difference is that this returns true only if the input character also matches isWORDCHAR. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isIDFIRST_A , isIDFIRST_L1 , isIDFIRST_uni , isIDFIRST_utf8 , isIDFIRST_LC , isIDFIRST_LC_uvchr , and isIDFIRST_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否可以是标识符的第一个字符。这与正式的Unicode属性 XID_Start 非常接近，但并不完全相同。区别在于，仅当输入字符也匹配isWORDCHAR时，此方法才返回true 。有关变体 isIDFIRST_A ， isIDFIRST_L1 ， isIDFIRST_uni ， isIDFIRST_utf8 ， isIDFIRST_LC ， isIDFIRST_LC_uvchr 和 isIDFIRST_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character can be the first character of an identifier. This is very close to, but not quite the same as the official Unicode property XID_Start. The difference is that this returns true only if the input character also matches "isWORDCHAR". See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isIDFIRST_A, isIDFIRST_L1, isIDFIRST_uvchr, isIDFIRST_utf8, isIDFIRST_utf8_safe, isIDFIRST_LC, isIDFIRST_LC_uvchr, isIDFIRST_LC_utf8, and isIDFIRST_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否可以是标识符的第一个字符。这与正式的Unicode属性 XID_Start 非常接近，但并不完全相同。区别在于，仅当输入字符也匹配“ isWORDCHAR”时，此方法才返回true 。有关变体 isIDFIRST_A ， isIDFIRST_L1 ， isIDFIRST_uvchr ， isIDFIRST_utf8 ， isIDFIRST_utf8_safe ， isIDFIRST_LC ， isIDFIRST_LC_uvchr ， isIDFIRST_LC_utf8 和 isIDFIRST_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character can be the second or succeeding character of an identifier. This is very close to, but not quite the same as the official Unicode property XID_Continue . The difference is that this returns true only if the input character also matches isWORDCHAR. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isIDCONT_A , isIDCONT_L1 , isIDCONT_uni , isIDCONT_utf8 , isIDCONT_LC , isIDCONT_LC_uvchr , and isIDCONT_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符可以是标识符的第二个字符还是后续的字符。这与正式的Unicode属性 XID_Continue 非常接近，但并不完全相同。区别在于，仅当输入字符也匹配isWORDCHAR时，此方法才返回true 。有关变体 isIDCONT_A ， isIDCONT_L1 ， isIDCONT_uni ， isIDCONT_utf8 ， isIDCONT_LC ， isIDCONT_LC_uvchr 和 isIDCONT_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character can be the second or succeeding character of an identifier. This is very close to, but not quite the same as the official Unicode property XID_Continue. The difference is that this returns true only if the input character also matches "isWORDCHAR". See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isIDCONT_A, isIDCONT_L1, isIDCONT_uvchr, isIDCONT_utf8, isIDCONT_utf8_safe, isIDCONT_LC, isIDCONT_LC_uvchr, isIDCONT_LC_utf8, and isIDCONT_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该布尔值指示指定的字符可以是标识符的第二个字符还是后续的字符。这与正式的Unicode属性 XID_Continue 非常接近，但并不完全相同。区别在于，仅当输入字符也匹配“ isWORDCHAR”时，此方法才返回true 。有关变体 isIDCONT_A ， isIDCONT_L1 ， isIDCONT_uvchr ， isIDCONT_utf8 ， isIDCONT_utf8_safe ， isIDCONT_LC ， isIDCONT_LC_uvchr ， isIDCONT_LC_utf8 和 isIDCONT_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a character considered to be a blank, analogous to m/[[:blank:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isBLANK_A , isBLANK_L1 , isBLANK_uni , isBLANK_utf8 , isBLANK_LC , isBLANK_LC_uvchr , and isBLANK_LC_utf8 . Note, however, that some platforms do not have the C library routine isblank() . In these cases, the variants whose names contain LC are the same as the corresponding ones without.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示指定字符是否是被视为空白的字符，类似于 m/[[:blank:]]/ 。有关变体 isBLANK_A ， isBLANK_L1 ， isBLANK_uni ， isBLANK_utf8 ， isBLANK_LC ， isBLANK_LC_uvchr 和 isBLANK_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。但是请注意，某些平台没有C库例程 isblank() 。在这些情况下，名称中包含 LC 的变体与不包含名称的相应变体相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a character considered to be a blank, analogous to m/[[:blank:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isBLANK_A, isBLANK_L1, isBLANK_uvchr, isBLANK_utf8, isBLANK_utf8_safe, isBLANK_LC, isBLANK_LC_uvchr, isBLANK_LC_utf8, and isBLANK_LC_utf8_safe. Note, however, that some platforms do not have the C library routine isblank(). In these cases, the variants whose names contain LC are the same as the corresponding ones without.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示指定的字符是否是被视为空白的字符，类似于 m/[[:blank:]]/ 。有关变体 isBLANK_A ， isBLANK_L1 ， isBLANK_uvchr ， isBLANK_utf8 ， isBLANK_utf8_safe ， isBLANK_LC ， isBLANK_LC_uvchr ， isBLANK_LC_utf8 和 isBLANK_LC_utf8_safe 的解释，请参见本节的顶部。但是请注意，某些平台没有C库例程 isblank() 。在这些情况下，其名称包含 LC 的变体 与没有的对应的相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a character that is a word character, analogous to what m/\w/ and m/[[:word:]]/ match in a regular expression. A word character is an alphabetic character, a decimal digit, a connecting punctuation character (such as an underscore), or a "mark" character that attaches to one of those (like some sort of accent). isALNUM() is a synonym provided for backward compatibility, even though a word character includes more than the standard C language meaning of alphanumeric. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isWORDCHAR_A , isWORDCHAR_L1 , isWORDCHAR_uni , and isWORDCHAR_utf8 . isWORDCHAR_LC , isWORDCHAR_LC_uvchr , and isWORDCHAR_LC_utf8 are also as described there, but additionally include the platform's native underscore.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否是单词字符，类似于正则表达式中的 m/\w/ 和 m/[[:word:]]/ 匹配。单词字符是字母字符，十进制数字，连接的标点字符（例如下划线）或附加到其中之一的“标记”字符（例如某种重音符号）。 isALNUM() 是一个向后兼容的同义词，即使单词字符包含的字符超过了标准C语言字母数字的含义。有关变体 isWORDCHAR_A ， isWORDCHAR_L1 ， isWORDCHAR_uni 和的解释，请参见本节的顶部。 isWORDCHAR_utf8 。 isWORDCHAR_LC ， isWORDCHAR_LC_uvchr 和 isWORDCHAR_LC_utf8 也如此处所述，但还包括平台的本机下划线。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a character that is a word character, analogous to what m/\w/ and m/[[:word:]]/ match in a regular expression. A word character is an alphabetic character, a decimal digit, a connecting punctuation character (such as an underscore), or a "mark" character that attaches to one of those (like some sort of accent). isALNUM() is a synonym provided for backward compatibility, even though a word character includes more than the standard C language meaning of alphanumeric. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isWORDCHAR_A, isWORDCHAR_L1, isWORDCHAR_uvchr, isWORDCHAR_utf8, and isWORDCHAR_utf8_safe. isWORDCHAR_LC, isWORDCHAR_LC_uvchr, isWORDCHAR_LC_utf8, and isWORDCHAR_LC_utf8_safe are also as described there, but additionally include the platform's native underscore.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该布尔值指示指定的字符是否是单词字符，类似于正则表达式中的 m/\w/ 和 m/[[:word:]]/ 匹配。单词字符是字母字符，十进制数字，连接的标点字符（例如下划线）或附加到其中之一的“标记”字符（例如某种重音符号）。 isALNUM() 是为了向后兼容而提供的同义词，即使单词字符包含的字符超过了标准C语言字母数字的含义。请参阅本节的顶部为变种的解释 isWORDCHAR_A ， isWORDCHAR_L1 ， isWORDCHAR_uvchr ， isWORDCHAR_utf8 和 isWORDCHAR_utf8_safe 。 isWORDCHAR_LC ， isWORDCHAR_LC_uvchr ， isWORDCHAR_LC_utf8 和 isWORDCHAR_LC_utf8_safe 也如此处所述，但还包括平台的本机下划线。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a control character, analogous to m/[[:cntrl:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isCNTRL_A , isCNTRL_L1 , isCNTRL_uni , isCNTRL_utf8 , isCNTRL_LC , isCNTRL_LC_uvchr , and isCNTRL_LC_utf8 On EBCDIC platforms, you almost always want to use the isCNTRL_L1 variant.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为控制字符，类似于 m/[[:cntrl:]]/ 。有关变体 isCNTRL_A ， isCNTRL_L1 ， isCNTRL_uni ， isCNTRL_utf8 ， isCNTRL_LC ， isCNTRL_LC_uvchr 和 isCNTRL_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。在EBCDIC平台上，几乎总是希望使用 isCNTRL_L1 变体。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a control character, analogous to m/[[:cntrl:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isCNTRL_A, isCNTRL_L1, isCNTRL_uvchr, isCNTRL_utf8, isCNTRL_utf8_safe, isCNTRL_LC, isCNTRL_LC_uvchr, isCNTRL_LC_utf8 and isCNTRL_LC_utf8_safe. On EBCDIC platforms, you almost always want to use the isCNTRL_L1 variant.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否是控制字符，类似于 m/[[:cntrl:]]/ 。有关变体 isCNTRL_A ， isCNTRL_L1 ， isCNTRL_uvchr ， isCNTRL_utf8 ， isCNTRL_utf8_safe ， isCNTRL_LC ， isCNTRL_LC_uvchr ， isCNTRL_LC_utf8 和 isCNTRL_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。在EBCDIC平台上，您几乎总是想使用 isCNTRL_L1 变体。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a digit, analogous to m/[[:digit:]]/. Variants isDIGIT_A and isDIGIT_L1 are identical to isDIGIT . See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isDIGIT_uni , isDIGIT_utf8 , isDIGIT_LC , isDIGIT_LC_uvchr , and isDIGIT_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为数字，类似于 m/[[:digit:]]/ 。变种 isDIGIT_A 和 isDIGIT_L1 是相同的 isDIGIT 。有关变体 isDIGIT_uni ， isDIGIT_utf8 ， isDIGIT_LC ， isDIGIT_LC_uvchr 和 isDIGIT_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a digit, analogous to m/[[:digit:]]/. Variants isDIGIT_A and isDIGIT_L1 are identical to isDIGIT. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isDIGIT_uvchr, isDIGIT_utf8, isDIGIT_utf8_safe, isDIGIT_LC, isDIGIT_LC_uvchr, isDIGIT_LC_utf8, and isDIGIT_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定字符是否为数字，类似于 m/[[:digit:]]/ 。变种 isDIGIT_A 和 isDIGIT_L1 是相同的 isDIGIT 。有关变体 isDIGIT_uvchr ， isDIGIT_utf8 ， isDIGIT_utf8_safe ， isDIGIT_LC ， isDIGIT_LC_uvchr ， isDIGIT_LC_utf8 和 isDIGIT_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a either an alphabetic character or decimal digit, analogous to m/[[:alnum:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isALPHANUMERIC_A , isALPHANUMERIC_L1 , isALPHANUMERIC_uni , isALPHANUMERIC_utf8 , isALPHANUMERIC_LC , isALPHANUMERIC_LC_uvchr , and isALPHANUMERIC_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是字母字符还是十进制数字，类似于 m/[[:alnum:]]/ 。有关变体 isALPHANUMERIC_A ， isALPHANUMERIC_L1 ， isALPHANUMERIC_uni ， isALPHANUMERIC_utf8 ， isALPHANUMERIC_LC ， isALPHANUMERIC_LC_uvchr 和 isALPHANUMERIC_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a graphic character, analogous to m/[[:graph:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isGRAPH_A , isGRAPH_L1 , isGRAPH_uni , isGRAPH_utf8 , isGRAPH_LC , isGRAPH_LC_uvchr , and isGRAPH_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为图形字符，类似于 m/[[:graph:]]/ 。有关变体 isGRAPH_A ， isGRAPH_L1 ， isGRAPH_uni ， isGRAPH_utf8 ， isGRAPH_LC ， isGRAPH_LC_uvchr 和 isGRAPH_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a graphic character, analogous to m/[[:graph:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isGRAPH_A, isGRAPH_L1, isGRAPH_uvchr, isGRAPH_utf8, isGRAPH_utf8_safe, isGRAPH_LC, isGRAPH_LC_uvchr, isGRAPH_LC_utf8_safe, and isGRAPH_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为图形字符，类似于 m/[[:graph:]]/ 。有关变体 isGRAPH_A ， isGRAPH_L1 ， isGRAPH_uvchr ， isGRAPH_utf8 ， isGRAPH_utf8_safe ， isGRAPH_LC ， isGRAPH_LC_uvchr ， isGRAPH_LC_utf8_safe 和 isGRAPH_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a hexadecimal digit. In the ASCII range these are [0-9A-Fa-f] . Variants isXDIGIT_A() and isXDIGIT_L1() are identical to isXDIGIT() . See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isXDIGIT_uni , isXDIGIT_utf8 , isXDIGIT_LC , isXDIGIT_LC_uvchr , and isXDIGIT_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为十六进制数字。在ASCII范围内，这些是 [0-9A-Fa-f] 。变体 isXDIGIT_A() 和 isXDIGIT_L1() 是相同的 isXDIGIT() 。有关变体 isXDIGIT_uni ， isXDIGIT_utf8 ， isXDIGIT_LC ， isXDIGIT_LC_uvchr 和 isXDIGIT_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a hexadecimal digit. In the ASCII range these are [0-9A-Fa-f]. Variants isXDIGIT_A() and isXDIGIT_L1() are identical to isXDIGIT(). See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isXDIGIT_uvchr, isXDIGIT_utf8, isXDIGIT_utf8_safe, isXDIGIT_LC, isXDIGIT_LC_uvchr, isXDIGIT_LC_utf8, and isXDIGIT_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该布尔值指示指定的字符是否为十六进制数字。在ASCII范围内，这些是 [0-9A-Fa-f] 。变体 isXDIGIT_A() 和 isXDIGIT_L1() 是相同的 isXDIGIT() 。有关变体 isXDIGIT_uvchr ， isXDIGIT_utf8 ， isXDIGIT_utf8_safe ， isXDIGIT_LC ， isXDIGIT_LC_uvchr ， isXDIGIT_LC_utf8 和 isXDIGIT_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a lowercase character, analogous to m/[[:lower:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isLOWER_A , isLOWER_L1 , isLOWER_uni , isLOWER_utf8 , isLOWER_LC , isLOWER_LC_uvchr , and isLOWER_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定字符是否为小写字符，类似于 m/[[:lower:]]/ 。有关变体 isLOWER_A ， isLOWER_L1 ， isLOWER_uni ， isLOWER_utf8 ， isLOWER_LC ， isLOWER_LC_uvchr 和 isLOWER_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a lowercase character, analogous to m/[[:lower:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isLOWER_A, isLOWER_L1, isLOWER_uvchr, isLOWER_utf8, isLOWER_utf8_safe, isLOWER_LC, isLOWER_LC_uvchr, isLOWER_LC_utf8, and isLOWER_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为小写字符，类似于 m/[[:lower:]]/ 。有关变体 isLOWER_A ， isLOWER_L1 ， isLOWER_uvchr ， isLOWER_utf8 ， isLOWER_utf8_safe ， isLOWER_LC ， isLOWER_LC_uvchr ， isLOWER_LC_utf8 和 isLOWER_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a printable character, analogous to m/[[:print:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isPRINT_A , isPRINT_L1 , isPRINT_uni , isPRINT_utf8 , isPRINT_LC , isPRINT_LC_uvchr , and isPRINT_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为可打印字符，类似于 m/[[:print:]]/ 。有关变体 isPRINT_A ， isPRINT_L1 ， isPRINT_uni ， isPRINT_utf8 ， isPRINT_LC ， isPRINT_LC_uvchr 和 isPRINT_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a printable character, analogous to m/[[:print:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isPRINT_A, isPRINT_L1, isPRINT_uvchr, isPRINT_utf8, isPRINT_utf8_safe, isPRINT_LC, isPRINT_LC_uvchr, isPRINT_LC_utf8, and isPRINT_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为可打印字符，类似于 m/[[:print:]]/ 。有关变体 isPRINT_A ， isPRINT_L1 ， isPRINT_uvchr ， isPRINT_utf8 ， isPRINT_utf8_safe ， isPRINT_LC ， isPRINT_LC_uvchr ， isPRINT_LC_utf8 和 isPRINT_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a punctuation character, analogous to m/[[:punct:]]/. Note that the definition of what is punctuation isn't as straightforward as one might desire. See POSIX Character Classes in perlrecharclass for details. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isPUNCT_A , isPUNCT_L1 , isPUNCT_uni , isPUNCT_utf8 , isPUNCT_LC , isPUNCT_LC_uvchr , and isPUNCT_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为标点符号，类似于 m/[[:punct:]]/ 。请注意，标点符号的定义并不像人们期望的那样简单。有关详细信息，请参见perlrecharclass中的POSIX字符类。有关变体 isPUNCT_A ， isPUNCT_L1 ， isPUNCT_uni ， isPUNCT_utf8 ， isPUNCT_LC ， isPUNCT_LC_uvchr 和 isPUNCT_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a punctuation character, analogous to m/[[:punct:]]/. Note that the definition of what is punctuation isn't as straightforward as one might desire. See "POSIX Character Classes" in perlrecharclass for details. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isPUNCT_A, isPUNCT_L1, isPUNCT_uvchr, isPUNCT_utf8, isPUNCT_utf8_safe, isPUNCT_LC, isPUNCT_LC_uvchr, isPUNCT_LC_utf8, and isPUNCT_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为标点字符，类似于 m/[[:punct:]]/ 。请注意，标点符号的定义并不像人们期望的那样简单。有关详细信息，请参见perlrecharclass中的“ POSIX字符类”。有关变体 isPUNCT_A ， isPUNCT_L1 ， isPUNCT_uvchr ， isPUNCT_utf8 ， isPUNCT_utf8_safe ， isPUNCT_LC ， isPUNCT_LC_uvchr ， isPUNCT_LC_utf8 和 isPUNCT_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a whitespace character. This is analogous to what m/\s/ matches in a regular expression. Starting in Perl 5.18 this also matches what m/[[:space:]]/ does. Prior to 5.18, only the locale forms of this macro (the ones with LC in their names) matched precisely what m/[[:space:]]/ does. In those releases, the only difference, in the non-locale variants, was that isSPACE() did not match a vertical tab. (See isPSXSPC for a macro that matches a vertical tab in all releases.) See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isSPACE_A , isSPACE_L1 , isSPACE_uni , isSPACE_utf8 , isSPACE_LC , isSPACE_LC_uvchr , and isSPACE_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为空白字符。这类似于 m/\s/ 在正则表达式中匹配的内容。从Perl 5.18开始，它也与 m/[[:space:]]/ 的功能匹配。在5.18之前，仅此宏的语言环境形式（名称中带有 LC 的语言环境形式）与 m/[[:space:]]/ 完全匹配。在那些发行版中，在非语言环境变体中，唯一的区别是 isSPACE() 与垂直制表符不匹配。 （有关所有发行版中与垂直选项卡匹配的宏，请参见isPSXSPC。）有关变体 isSPACE_A ， isSPACE_L1 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。， isSPACE_uni ， isSPACE_utf8 ， isSPACE_LC ， isSPACE_LC_uvchr 和 isSPACE_LC_utf8 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is a whitespace character. This is analogous to what m/\s/ matches in a regular expression. Starting in Perl 5.18 this also matches what m/[[:space:]]/ does. Prior to 5.18, only the locale forms of this macro (the ones with LC in their names) matched precisely what m/[[:space:]]/ does. In those releases, the only difference, in the non-locale variants, was that isSPACE() did not match a vertical tab. (See "isPSXSPC" for a macro that matches a vertical tab in all releases.) See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isSPACE_A, isSPACE_L1, isSPACE_uvchr, isSPACE_utf8, isSPACE_utf8_safe, isSPACE_LC, isSPACE_LC_uvchr, isSPACE_LC_utf8, and isSPACE_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为空白字符。这类似于 m/\s/ 在正则表达式中匹配的内容。从Perl 5.18开始，它也匹配 m/[[:space:]]/ 的功能。在5.18之前，仅此宏的语言环境形式（名称中带有 LC 的语言环境形式）与 m/[[:space:]]/ 的功能完全匹配。在那些发行版中，在非语言环境变体中，唯一的区别是 isSPACE() 与垂直制表符不匹配。 （有关所有发行版中与垂直选项卡匹配的宏，请参见“ isPSXSPC”。）有关变体 isSPACE_A ， isSPACE_L1 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。， isSPACE_uvchr ， isSPACE_utf8 ， isSPACE_utf8_safe ， isSPACE_LC ， isSPACE_LC_uvchr ， isSPACE_LC_utf8 和 isSPACE_LC_utf8_safe 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is an alphabetic character, analogous to m/[[:alpha:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isALPHA_A , isALPHA_L1 , isALPHA_uni , isALPHA_utf8 , isALPHA_LC , isALPHA_LC_uvchr , and isALPHA_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为字母字符，类似于 m/[[:alpha:]]/ 。有关变体 isALPHA_A ， isALPHA_L1 ， isALPHA_uni ， isALPHA_utf8 ， isALPHA_LC ， isALPHA_LC_uvchr 和 isALPHA_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is an octal digit, [0-7]. The only two variants are isOCTAL_A and isOCTAL_L1 ; each is identical to isOCTAL .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定字符是否为八进制数字[0-7]。仅有的两个变体是 isOCTAL_A 和 isOCTAL_L1 ；每个是相同的 isOCTAL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is an octal digit, [0-7]. The only two variants are isOCTAL_A and isOCTAL_L1; each is identical to isOCTAL.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为八进制数字[0-7]。仅有的两个变体是 isOCTAL_A 和 isOCTAL_L1 ；每个都与 isOCTAL 相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is an uppercase character, analogous to m/[[:upper:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isUPPER_A , isUPPER_L1 , isUPPER_uni , isUPPER_utf8 , isUPPER_LC , isUPPER_LC_uvchr , and isUPPER_LC_utf8 .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为大写字符，类似于 m/[[:upper:]]/ 。有关变体 isUPPER_A ， isUPPER_L1 ， isUPPER_uni ， isUPPER_utf8 ， isUPPER_LC ， isUPPER_LC_uvchr 和 isUPPER_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is an uppercase character, analogous to m/[[:upper:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isUPPER_A, isUPPER_L1, isUPPER_uvchr, isUPPER_utf8, isUPPER_utf8_safe, isUPPER_LC, isUPPER_LC_uvchr, isUPPER_LC_utf8, and isUPPER_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为大写字符，类似于 m/[[:upper:]]/ 。有关变体 isUPPER_A ， isUPPER_L1 ， isUPPER_uvchr ， isUPPER_utf8 ， isUPPER_utf8_safe ， isUPPER_LC ， isUPPER_LC_uvchr ， isUPPER_LC_utf8 和 isUPPER_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is one of [A-Za-z0-9], analogous to m/[[:alnum:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isALPHANUMERIC_A, isALPHANUMERIC_L1, isALPHANUMERIC_uvchr, isALPHANUMERIC_utf8, isALPHANUMERIC_utf8_safe, isALPHANUMERIC_LC, isALPHANUMERIC_LC_uvchr, isALPHANUMERIC_LC_utf8, and isALPHANUMERIC_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否为 [A-Za-z0-9] 之一，类似于 m/[[:alnum:]]/ 。请参阅本节的顶部为变体的解释 isALPHANUMERIC_A ， isALPHANUMERIC_L1 ， isALPHANUMERIC_uvchr ， isALPHANUMERIC_utf8 ， isALPHANUMERIC_utf8_safe ， isALPHANUMERIC_LC ， isALPHANUMERIC_LC_uvchr ， isALPHANUMERIC_LC_utf8 和 isALPHANUMERIC_LC_utf8_safe 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is one of the 128 characters in the ASCII character set, analogous to m/[[:ascii:]]/. On non-ASCII platforms, it returns TRUE iff this character corresponds to an ASCII character. Variants isASCII_A() and isASCII_L1() are identical to isASCII() . See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isASCII_uni , isASCII_utf8 , isASCII_LC , isASCII_LC_uvchr , and isASCII_LC_utf8 . Note, however, that some platforms do not have the C library routine isascii() . In these cases, the variants whose names contain LC are the same as the corresponding ones without.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否是ASCII字符集中的128个字符之一，类似于 m/[[:ascii:]]/ 。在非ASCII平台上，如果此字符对应于ASCII字符，则返回TRUE。变体 isASCII_A() 和 isASCII_L1() 是相同的 isASCII() 。有关变体 isASCII_uni ， isASCII_utf8 ， isASCII_LC ， isASCII_LC_uvchr 和 isASCII_LC_utf8 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。但是请注意，某些平台没有C库例程 isascii() 。在这些情况下，名称中包含 LC 的变体与不包含名称的相应变体相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified character is one of the 128 characters in the ASCII character set, analogous to m/[[:ascii:]]/. On non-ASCII platforms, it returns TRUE iff this character corresponds to an ASCII character. Variants isASCII_A() and isASCII_L1() are identical to isASCII(). See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isASCII_uvchr, isASCII_utf8, isASCII_utf8_safe, isASCII_LC, isASCII_LC_uvchr, isASCII_LC_utf8, and isASCII_LC_utf8_safe. Note, however, that some platforms do not have the C library routine isascii(). In these cases, the variants whose names contain LC are the same as the corresponding ones without.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的字符是否是ASCII字符集中的128个字符之一，类似于 m/[[:ascii:]]/ 。在非ASCII平台上，如果此字符对应于ASCII字符，则返回TRUE。变体 isASCII_A() 和 isASCII_L1() 是相同的 isASCII() 。有关变体 isASCII_uvchr ， isASCII_utf8 ， isASCII_utf8_safe ， isASCII_LC ， isASCII_LC_uvchr ， isASCII_LC_utf8 和 isASCII_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。。但是请注意，某些平台没有C库例程 isascii() 。在这些情况下，名称中包含 LC 的变体与不包含名称的相应变体相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified filehandle is connected to a tty. Similar to the -t operator, see -X.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的文件句柄是否已连接到tty。与 -t 运算符相似，请参见-X。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified filehandle is connected to a tty. Similar to the -t operator, see "-X" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的文件句柄是否已连接到tty。与 -t 运算符类似，请参见perlfunc中的“ -X”。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified hash key exists. hash can be a valid precomputed hash value, or 0 to ask for it to be computed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的哈希键是否存在。 hash 可以是有效的预先计算的hash值，也可以是0以要求对其进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified hash key exists. The absolute value of klen is the length of the key. If klen is negative the key is assumed to be in UTF-8-encoded Unicode.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的哈希键是否存在。 klen 的绝对值是密钥的长度。如果 klen 为负，则假定密钥为UTF-8编码的Unicode。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified input is one of [A-Za-z], analogous to m/[[:alpha:]]/. See the top of this section for an explanation of variants isALPHA_A, isALPHA_L1, isALPHA_uvchr, isALPHA_utf8, isALPHA_utf8_safe, isALPHA_LC, isALPHA_LC_uvchr, isALPHA_LC_utf8, and isALPHA_LC_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示指定的输入是否为 [A-Za-z] 之一，类似于 m/[[:alpha:]]/ 。有关变体 isALPHA_A ， isALPHA_L1 ， isALPHA_uvchr ， isALPHA_utf8 ， isALPHA_utf8_safe ， isALPHA_LC ， isALPHA_LC_uvchr ， isALPHA_LC_utf8 和 isALPHA_LC_utf8_safe 的说明，请参见本节的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the strings in the two SVs are identical. Is UTF-8 and 'use bytes' aware and coerces its args to strings if necessary. If the flags include SV_GMAGIC, it handles get-magic, too.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示两个SVs中的字符串是否相同。识别UTF-8和 "使用字节",并在必要时将其args强制为字符串。如果flag中包含SV_GMAGIC,它也会处理get-magic。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the strings in the two SVs are identical. Is UTF-8 and 'use bytes' aware, handles get magic, and will coerce its args to strings if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示两个SV中的字符串是否相同。识别UTF-8和 "使用字节",处理get magic,并在必要时将其args强制为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the strings in the two SVs are identical. Is UTF-8 and 'use bytes' aware and coerces its args to strings if necessary. If the flags has the SV_GMAGIC bit set, it handles get-magic, too.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示两个SV中的字符串是否相同。是否知道UTF-8和 'use bytes' 并在必要时将其args强制转换为字符串。如果标志将 SV_GMAGIC 位置1，则它也处理get-magic。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the strings in the two SVs are identical. Is UTF-8 and 'use bytes' aware, handles get magic, and will coerce its args to strings if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示两个SV中的字符串是否相同。是否知道UTF-8和 'use bytes' ，句柄变得神奇，并在必要时将其args强制转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean status indicating whether or not the given classname is either UNIVERSAL itself, or one of UNIVERSAL 's parents by @ISA inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔状态指示给定的类名是否是要么 UNIVERSAL 本身，或者一个 UNIVERSAL 的父母通过 @ISA 继承。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean status indicating whether or not the given classname is either UNIVERSAL itself, or one of UNIVERSAL's parents by @ISA inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔状态指示给定的类名是否是要么 UNIVERSAL 本身，或者一个 UNIVERSAL 的父母通过 @ISA 继承。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean to indicate whether the current object has content. Some special files like directories and so on never will have any content. This method is mainly to make sure you don't get warnings for using uninitialized values when looking at an object's content.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示当前对象是否有内容。一些特殊的文件如目录等永远不会有任何内容。这个方法主要是为了确保在查看对象的内容时不会因为使用未初始化的值而收到警告。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the number of tests planned matches the number of tests run.
trans-unit.target: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not match the number of tests planned with the number of running.

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the test passed, regardless of its TODO status.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示测试是否通过,无论其TODO状态如何。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the test passed. Remember that for TODO tests, the test always passes.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示测试是否通过的布尔值。记住,对于TODO测试,测试总是通过的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not this test had a SKIP directive.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示该测试是否有SKIP指令。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not this test had a TODO directive.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示这个测试是否有TODO指令。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not this test has a SKIP directive.
trans-unit.target: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not this test has a SKIP directive.

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not this test has a TODO directive.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示该测试是否有TODO指令的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the metadata provided is valid.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值,表示所提供的元数据是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Returns a byte count if successful (which may be zero or positive), returns negative value and sets errno on error. Depending on implementation errno may be EINTR if operation was interrupted by a signal.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，则返回字节计数（可以为零或正），返回负值，并在错误时设置 errno 。如果操作被信号中断，根据实现的不同， errno 可能是 EINTR 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a byte string representation of OBJ. The byte string is in big endian byte order, so if OBJ represents the number 256, the output should be the two-byte string "\x01\x00".
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ的字节串表示。字节串是按大英汉字节顺序排列的,所以如果OBJ表示256,输出的应该是两个字节的字符串"\x01\x00"。

trans-unit.source: Returns a byte string representation of the number using big endian byte order. The invocand must be a non-negative, finite integer. See also from_bytes().
trans-unit.target: 返回一个使用大恩迪安字节顺序表示的字节字符串。invocand必须是一个非负的有限整数。参见 from_bytes()。

trans-unit.source: Returns a cleaned-up copy of the code to which certain transformations have been applied to make it more ANSI compliant.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个清理过的代码副本,该副本已经应用了某些转换,使其更加符合ANSI标准。

trans-unit.source: Returns a code reference which, when passed an appropriate line of TAP, returns the lexed token corresponding to that line. As a result, the basic TAP parsing loop looks similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代码引用,当传入适当的TAP行时,返回该行对应的lexed token。因此,基本的TAP解析循环看起来类似于下面。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the denominator (the part under the line) as positive BigInt.
trans-unit.target: 返回分母(线下部分)的副本,为正数BigInt。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the numerator (the part above the line) as signed BigInt.
trans-unit.target: 返回分子的副本(行上面的部分),为有符号的BigInt。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the object as BigFloat, preserving the accuracy as wanted, or the default of 40 digits.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的BigFloat副本,保留所需的精度,或默认的40位数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the object as BigInt, truncated to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的BigInt副本,截断为一个整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a definition for the POD2MAN macro. This is a program which emulates the pod2man utility. You can add more switches to the command by simply appending them on the macro.
trans-unit.target: 返回 POD2MAN 宏的定义。这是一个模拟pod2man工具的程序。您可以通过简单地在宏上添加更多的开关来增加命令。

trans-unit.source: Returns a double-quote-surrounded escaped version of STR which can be used as a string in C source code.
trans-unit.target: 返回STR的双引号包围转义版本,它可以作为C源代码中的字符串使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a double-quote-surrounded escaped version of STR which can be used as a string in Perl source code.
trans-unit.target: 返回STR的双引号包围的转义版本,它可以作为Perl源代码中的字符串使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a duplicate copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filehandle tied to the Net::Cmd object. After issuing a command, you may read from this filehandle using read() or <>. The filehandle will return EOF when the final dot is encountered. Similarly, you may write to the filehandle in order to send data to the server after issuing a command that expects data to be written.
trans-unit.target: 返回绑定到Net :: Cmd对象的文件句柄。发出命令后，您可以使用read（）或<>从此文件句柄读取。遇到最后一个点时，文件句柄将返回EOF。同样，您可以写入文件句柄，以便在发出期望写入数据的命令后将数据发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: Returns a floating seconds since the epoch. This function can be imported, resulting in a nice drop-in replacement for the time provided with core Perl; see the EXAMPLES below.
trans-unit.target: 返回自纪元以来的浮动秒数。可以导入此功能，从而可以很好地替代核心Perl提供的 time ；请参阅下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a floating seconds since the epoch. This function can be imported, resulting in a nice drop-in replacement for the time provided with core Perl; see the "EXAMPLES" below.
trans-unit.target: 返回自纪元以来的浮动秒数。可以导入此功能，从而可以很好地替代核心Perl所提供的 time ；请参阅下面的“示例”。

trans-unit.source: Returns a formatted string representing the runtime returned by elapsed() . This lets the caller not worry about Benchmark.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 elapsed() 返回的运行时的格式化字符串。这使呼叫者不必担心基准测试。

trans-unit.source: Returns a formatted string representing the runtime returned by elapsed(). This lets the caller not worry about Benchmark.

trans-unit.target: 返回一个四元素的列表,以秒为单位给出这个进程的用户和系统时间,以及这个进程的任何退出的子进程。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash reference of Benchmark objects, keyed by name.
trans-unit.target: 返回Benchmark对象的哈希引用,按名称键入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash reference of all errata seen, both whines and screams. The hash reference's keys are the line number and the value is an array reference of the errors for that line.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含所有错误信息的哈希引用,包括抱怨和尖叫。哈希引用的键是行号,值是该行错误的数组引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash reference. The keys of the hash are the letters D , S , L , I , and <P>, for development status, support level, language, interface and public licence respectively. The data for the DSLIP status are collected by pause.perl.org when authors register their namespaces. The values of the 5 hash elements are one-character words whose meaning is described in the table below. There are also 5 hash elements DV , SV , LV , IV , and <PV> that carry a more verbose value of the 5 status variables.
trans-unit.target: 返回哈希引用。哈希的密钥分别是字母 D ， S ， L ， I 和<P>，分别表示开发状态，支持级别，语言，界面和公共许可证。当作者注册其命名空间时，pause.perl.org会收集DSLIP状态的数据。5个哈希元素的值是一个字符的单词，其含义在下表中描述。还有5个散列元素 DV ， SV ， LV ， IV 和<PV>，它们带有5个状态变量的更详细的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash with system information. The keys of the hash are
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含系统信息的哈希值。哈希的键是

trans-unit.target: 返回一个原始结果的哈希夫,适合于YAML的序列化。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个原始测试数据的哈希夫,适合于YAML序列化。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hexadecimal string representation of the number. See also from_hex().
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的十六进制字符串。参见from_hex()。

trans-unit.source: Returns a language code accepted and used actually on collation. If linguistic tailoring is not provided for a language code you passed (intensionally for some languages, or due to the incomplete implementation), this method returns a string 'default' meaning no special tailoring.
trans-unit.target: 返回接受并在整理时实际使用的语言代码。如果没有为您传递的语言代码提供语言剪裁（某些语言是故意的，或者由于实现不完整），则此方法将返回字符串 'default' 表示没有特殊剪裁。

trans-unit.source: Returns a letter without colon.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个不带冒号的字母。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing all of the original symbol names from this set.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含该集合中所有原始符号名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing all of the trimmed symbol names from this set.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含该集合中所有修剪过的符号名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of Archive::Tar::File objects that were just added.
trans-unit.target: 返回刚刚添加的 Archive::Tar::File 对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of IDs of modules contained in a distribution file. Works only for distributions listed in the 02packages.details.txt.gz file. This typically means that just most recent version of a distribution is covered.

trans-unit.target: 除了通常的集合外,返回要在清理目标中删除的操作系统特定文件的列表。

trans-unit.target: 返回POD部分的列表。

trans-unit.target: 返回addr、type、subcode的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all non-joined, non-detached Thread objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有非连接、非分离的线程对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all of the named buffers defined in the last successful match. If $all is true, then it returns all names defined, if not it returns only names which were involved in the match.
trans-unit.target: 返回上一次成功匹配中定义的所有命名缓冲区的列表,如果$all为真,则返回所有定义的名称,否则只返回参与匹配的名称。如果$all为真,则返回所有定义的名字,如果不是,则只返回参与匹配的名字。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of canonical names of available encodings that have already been loaded. To get a list of all available encodings including those that have not yet been loaded, say:
trans-unit.target: 返回已经加载的可用编码的规范名称列表。要获取所有可用编码的列表,包括那些尚未加载的编码,比如说。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of errors seen during validation.
trans-unit.target: 返回验证过程中看到的错误列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of filenames extracted.
trans-unit.target: 返回提取的文件名列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of handles. If EVENT_MASK is not given then a list of all handles known will be returned. If EVENT_MASK is given then a list of handles will be returned which had one of the events specified by EVENT_MASK happen during the last call ti poll
trans-unit.target: 返回句柄列表。如果未提供EVENT_MASK，则将返回所有已知句柄的列表。如果给出了EVENT_MASK，则将返回句柄列表，该句柄的列表中有EVENT_MASK指定的事件之一发生在上次调用ti poll 期间

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of language tags that are superordinate tags to $lang1 -- it gets this by removing subtags from the end of $lang1 until nothing (or just "i" or "x") is left.
trans-unit.target: 返回$lang1的上级语言标签列表--它通过删除$lang1末尾的子标签来获得,直到什么都不剩(或只剩 "i "或 "x")。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of objects' IDs contained in a bundle. The associated objects may be bundles, modules or distributions.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个捆绑包中包含的对象ID的列表。相关的对象可以是捆绑包、模块或发行版。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of operator names corresponding to those operators in the set.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合中与这些运算符对应的运算符名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of packages. Note: this is a raw list of packages discovered (or assumed, in the case of main). It is not filtered for DB, main or private packages the way the provides method does. Invalid package names are not returned, for example "Foo:Bar". Strange but valid package names are returned, for example "Foo::Bar::", and are left up to the caller on how to handle.
trans-unit.target: 返回软件包列表。注意：这是发现的软件包的原始列表（对于 main ，是假定的）。它没有被过滤为 DB ， main 或私人包的方式 provides 方法一样。不返回无效的程序包名称，例如“ Foo：Bar”。返回奇怪但有效的程序包名称，例如“ Foo :: Bar ::”，并由调用方决定如何处理。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of pragmas each of which is a + or - followed by the pragma name.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个实用名词列表,每个实用名词后面都是一个+或-。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of statistics about a hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个关于哈希值的统计列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the C types that are mappable by this typemap object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型映射对象可映射的C类型列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the header files that should be used as dependencies for XS code, for this version of Perl on this platform.
trans-unit.target: Returns a list of header files that should be used as dependencies for XS code,for this version of Perl on this platform.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the names of all the files in the archive.
trans-unit.target: 返回存档中所有文件的名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the names of all the files in the archive. The first argument can either be the name of the tar file to list or a reference to an open file handle (e.g. a GLOB reference).
trans-unit.target: 返回存档中所有文件的名称列表。第一个参数可以是要列出的 tar 文件的名称,也可以是打开的文件句柄的引用(例如 GLOB 引用)。

trans-unit.target: 返回两个元素的列表。这两个元素是未删除元素的数量和mbox的大小,单位是八位数。

trans-unit.target: 返回$whatever中任何看似正式有效的语言标签的列表。不是很聪明,所以不要在你想给它提供的内容上太有创意。

trans-unit.source: Returns a lowercased version of EXPR. This is the internal function implementing the \L escape in double-quoted strings.
trans-unit.target: 返回小写版本的EXPR。这是在双引号字符串中实现 \L 转义的内部函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a make fragment containing any targets which have special meaning to make. For example, .SUFFIXES and .PHONY.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含任何对make有特殊意义的目标的make片段,例如.SUFFIXES和.PHONY。例如,.SUFFIXES和.PHONY。

trans-unit.target: Returns a make fragment defining all the macros initialized in init_platform()rather than put them in constants().

trans-unit.source: Returns a make fragment with the makemakerdeflt_target specified. This target is the first target in the Makefile, is the default target and simply points off to 'all' just in case any make variant gets confused or something gets snuck in before the real 'all' target.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指定了makemakerdeflt_target的make片段。这个目标是Makefile中的第一个目标,是默认目标,只是简单地指向 "all",以防任何make变体被混淆,或者在真正的 "all "目标之前被偷袭。

trans-unit.source: Returns a method name, or else a reference to the user-supplied subroutine used to print error messages. Returns undef if the carp builtin is used to issue error messages (this is the default behavior).
trans-unit.target: 返回方法名称，否则返回对用户提供的用于打印错误消息的子例程的引用。如果使用内置的carp发出错误消息，则返回 undef （这是默认行为）。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个临时文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a native FILE * used by a stdio layer. If there is none, it will create one with PerlIO_exportFILE. In either case the FILE * should be considered as belonging to PerlIO subsystem and should only be closed by calling PerlIO_close() .
trans-unit.target: 返回由stdio层使用的本机FILE *。如果没有，它将使用PerlIO_exportFILE创建一个。无论哪种情况，FILE *都应被视为属于PerlIO子系统，并且只能通过调用 PerlIO_close() 关闭。

trans-unit.source: Returns a native FILE * used by a stdio layer. If there is none, it will create one with PerlIO_exportFILE. In either case the FILE * should be considered as belonging to PerlIO subsystem and should only be closed by calling PerlIO_close().
trans-unit.target: 返回由stdio层使用的本机FILE *。如果没有，它将使用PerlIO_exportFILE创建一个。在这两种情况下，FILE *都应被视为属于PerlIO子系统，并且只能通过调用 PerlIO_close() 关闭。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new IO::Socket::INET instance wrapping the same filehandle. This may be useful in cases where it is required, for backward-compatibility, to have a real object of IO::Socket::INET type instead of IO::Socket::IP. The new object will wrap the same underlying socket filehandle as the original, so care should be taken not to continue to use both objects concurrently. Ideally the original $sock should be discarded after this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 返回包装相同文件句柄的新IO :: Socket :: INET实例。在为了向后兼容而需要具有 IO::Socket::INET 类型而不是 IO::Socket::IP 的真实对象的情况下，这可能很有用。新对象将包装与原始对象相同的基础套接字文件句柄，因此应注意不要继续同时使用两个对象。理想情况下，调用此方法后应丢弃原始的 $sock 。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的Digest::SHA对象。允许的值

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash reference with the metadata converted to a different form. convert will die if any conversion/standardization still results in an invalid structure.

trans-unit.target: 返回 Test::Builder 的新实例。此孩子的任何输出的缩进量将比父母的缩进多四个空格。完成后， finalize 方法

trans-unit.source: Returns a new typemap object. Takes an optional file parameter. If set, the given file will be read. If the file doesn't exist, an empty typemap is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的typemap对象。带有一个可选的 file 参数。如果设置，将读取给定的文件。如果文件不存在，则返回一个空的typemap。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new version object based on the passed in SV:
trans-unit.target: 基于SV中传递的版本对象返回一个新的版本对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new, empty XS parser/compiler object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的、空的XS解析器/编译器对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created Data::Dumper object. The first argument is an anonymous array of values to be dumped. The optional second argument is an anonymous array of names for the values. The names need not have a leading $ sign, and must be comprised of alphanumeric characters. You can begin a name with a * to specify that the dereferenced type must be dumped instead of the reference itself, for ARRAY and HASH references.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新创建的 Data::Dumper 对象。第一个参数是要转储的值的匿名数组。可选的第二个参数是值的名称的匿名数组。名称不必以 $ 开头，并且必须由字母数字字符组成。您可以使用 * 开头的名称来指定对于ARRAY和HASH引用，必须转储取消引用的类型而不是引用本身。

trans-unit.source: Returns a non-empty string if EXPR is a reference, the empty string otherwise. If EXPR is not specified, $_ will be used. The value returned depends on the type of thing the reference is a reference to.
trans-unit.target: 如果EXPR是引用，则返回非空字符串，否则返回空字符串。如果未指定EXPR，将使用 $_ 。返回的值取决于引用所引用的事物的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a normalized string representation of $x .
trans-unit.target: 返回 $x 的规范化字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a number between 0 & 1 reflecting how confidently the raw source can be handled. For example, 0 means the source cannot handle it, 0.5 means it may be able to, and 1 means it definitely can. See "detect_source" in TAP::Parser::IteratorFactory for details on how this is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回介于 0 和 1 之间的数字，反映了可以可靠地处理原始源的程度。例如， 0 表示源无法处理， 0.5 表示源可能处理， 1 表示绝对可以。有关如何使用它的详细信息，请参见TAP :: Parser :: IteratorFactory中的“ detect_source”。

trans-unit.source: Returns a numeric value for a Unix-like file descriptor. Returns -1 if there isn't one. Optional. Default is fileno($fh).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个类似Unix文件描述符的数值。如果没有,则返回-1。可选的,默认是fileno($fh)。默认值是fileno($fh)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a one-line description of the author
trans-unit.target: 返回对作者的单行描述

trans-unit.source: Returns a one-line description of the bundle
trans-unit.target: 返回该包的单行描述

trans-unit.source: Returns a one-line description of the distribution
trans-unit.target: 返回关于分布的单行描述

trans-unit.source: Returns a one-line description of the module in four columns: The first column contains the word Module , the second column consists of one character: an equals sign if this module is already installed and up-to-date, a less-than sign if this module is installed but can be upgraded, and a space if the module is not installed. The third column is the name of the module and the fourth column gives maintainer or distribution information.
trans-unit.target: 在四列中返回对模块的单行描述：第一列包含单词 Module ，第二列包含一个字符：如果已经安装了该模块并且是最新的，则为等号，小于号。如果已安装此模块但可以升级，则为空格；如果未安装该模块，则为空格。第三列是模块的名称，第四列是维护者或发行者的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a packed representation of the bucket array associated with a hash. Each element of the array is either an integer K, in which case it represents K empty buckets, or a reference to another array which contains the keys that are in that bucket.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与哈希相关联的桶数组的打包表示。数组中的每个元素要么是一个整数K,在这种情况下,它代表K个空桶,要么是一个指向另一个数组的引用,该数组中包含该桶中的键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to one element past the final element of the input C array.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向输入C数组中最后一个元素的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the escaped text as held by dsv.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向 dsv 所保存的转义文本的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the escaped text as held by dsv.
trans-unit.target: 返回由dsv持有的转义文本的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the next character after the parsed version string, as well as upgrading the passed in SV to an RV.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向解析版本字符串后的下一个字符的指针,以及将传入的SV升级为RV。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the physical string in the SV. The SV must contain a string. Prior to 5.9.3 it is not safe to execute this macro unless the SV's type >= SVt_PV.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向SV中物理字符串的指针。SV必须包含字符串。在5.9.3之前，除非SV的类型> = SVt_PV ,否则执行此宏并不安全。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the physical string in the SV. The SV must contain a string. Prior to 5.9.3 it is not safe to execute this macro unless the SV's type >= SVt_PV.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向SV中物理字符串的指针。SV必须包含字符串。在5.9.3之前，除非SV的类型> = SVt_PV，否则执行此宏并不安全。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the prettified text as held by dsv.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向由 dsv 保留的美化文本的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the prettified text as held by dsv.
trans-unit.target: 返回由dsv持有的预处理文本的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the spot just after the last character in the string which is in the SV, where there is usually a trailing NUL character (even though Perl scalars do not strictly require it). See "SvCUR". Access the character as *(SvEND(sv)).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向该点的指针，该点紧接在SV中字符串的最后一个字符之后，通常在该字符的末尾包含 NUL 字符（即使Perl标量并不严格要求该字符）。参见 "SvCUR" 。将字符作为 *(SvEND(sv)) 进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the spot just after the last character in the string which is in the SV, where there is usually a trailing NUL character (even though Perl scalars do not strictly require it). See SvCUR . Access the character as *(SvEND(sv)).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向该点的指针，该点恰好位于SV中字符串的最后一个字符之后，通常在该字符的末尾包含 NUL 字符（即使Perl标量并不严格要求该字符）。参见 SvCUR 。以*（SvEND（sv））的形式访问该字符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the stash for a specified package. See "gv_stashpvn".
trans-unit.target: 返回指向指定程序包的存储空间的指针。请参阅 "gv_stashpvn" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the stash for a specified package. See gv_stashpvn .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向指定程序包存储区的指针。请参阅 gv_stashpvn 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the stash for a specified package. The namelen parameter indicates the length of the name , in bytes. flags is passed to gv_fetchpvn_flags() , so if set to GV_ADD then the package will be created if it does not already exist. If the package does not exist and flags is 0 (or any other setting that does not create packages) then NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向指定程序包存储区的指针。的 namelen 参数表示的长度 name 以字节为单位。 flags 被传递到 gv_fetchpvn_flags() ，因此，如果将其设置为 GV_ADD ，则将创建该包（如果尚不存在）。如果包不存在并且 flags 为0（或任何其他不创建包的设置），则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the stash for a specified package. The namelen parameter indicates the length of the name, in bytes. flags is passed to gv_fetchpvn_flags(), so if set to GV_ADD then the package will be created if it does not already exist. If the package does not exist and flags is 0 (or any other setting that does not create packages) then NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向指定程序包的存储空间的指针。的 namelen 参数表示的长度 name 以字节为单位。 flags 被传递给 gv_fetchpvn_flags() ，因此，如果将其设置为 GV_ADD ，则将创建该包（如果尚不存在）。如果包不存在且 flags 为0（或任何其他不创建包的设置），则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the stash for a specified package. Uses strlen to determine the length of name , then calls gv_stashpvn() .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向指定程序包存储区的指针。使用 strlen 确定 name 的长度，然后调用 gv_stashpvn() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the stash for a specified package. Uses strlen to determine the length of name, then calls gv_stashpvn().
trans-unit.target: 返回指向指定程序包的存储空间的指针。使用 strlen 确定 name 的长度，然后调用 gv_stashpvn() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the string in the SV, or a stringified form of the SV if the SV does not contain a string. The SV may cache the stringified version becoming SvPOK . Handles 'get' magic. The len variable will be set to the length of the string (this is a macro, so don't use &len ). See also SvPVx for a version which guarantees to evaluate sv only once.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向SV中字符串的指针；如果SV不包含字符串，则返回SV的字符串化形式。SV可以将字符串化版本缓存为 SvPOK 。处理“获取”魔法。该 len 变量将被设置为字符串的长度（这是一个宏，所以不必使用 &len 个）。另请参见 SvPVx ，以获取保证只评估sv一次的版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the string in the SV, or a stringified form of the SV if the SV does not contain a string. The SV may cache the stringified version becoming SvPOK. Handles 'get' magic. The len variable will be set to the length of the string (this is a macro, so don't use &len). See also "SvPVx" for a version which guarantees to evaluate sv only once.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向SV中字符串的指针；如果SV不包含字符串，则返回SV的字符串化形式。 SV可以将字符串化版本缓存为 SvPOK 。处理“获取”魔法。该 len 变量将被设置为字符串的长度（这是一个宏，所以不必使用 &len 个）。另请参见 "SvPVx" 以获取保证只评估 sv 一次的版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the string value of an SV, and sets *lp to its length. If flags includes SV_GMAGIC, does an mg_get() first. Coerces sv to a string if necessary. Normally invoked via the SvPV_flags macro. sv_2pv() and sv_2pv_nomg usually end up here too.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向SV的字符串值的指针，并将* lp设置为其长度。如果标志包括SV_GMAGIC，则首先执行mg_get（）。如有必要，将sv强制转换为字符串。通常通过 SvPV_flags 宏调用。 sv_2pv() 和 sv_2pv_nomg 通常也会在这里结束。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the string value of an SV, and sets *lp to its length. If flags has the SV_GMAGIC bit set, does an mg_get() first. Coerces sv to a string if necessary. Normally invoked via the SvPV_flags macro. sv_2pv() and sv_2pv_nomg usually end up here too.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向SV的字符串值的指针，并将 *lp 设置为其长度。如果标志设置了 SV_GMAGIC 位，则首先执行 mg_get() 。如有必要，将 sv 强制转换为字符串。通常通过 SvPV_flags 宏调用。 sv_2pv() 和 sv_2pv_nomg 通常也会在这里结束。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the upgraded SV. Set the boolean qv if you want to force this SV to be interpreted as an "extended" version.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向升级后SV的指针。如果你想强制将这个SV解释为 "扩展 "版本,则设置布尔值qv。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pre-compiled regular expression which will match a chunk of TAP corresponding to the token type. For example (not that you should really pay attention to this, $grammar->syntax_for('comment') will return qr/^#(.*)/.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个预编译的正则表达式，它将匹配与令牌类型相对应的TAP块。例如（不是您真的要注意这一点， $grammar->syntax_for('comment') 将返回 qr/^#(.*)/ 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pre-compiled regular expression which will match a chunk of TAP corresponding to the token type. For example (not that you should really pay attention to this, $grammar->syntax_for('comment') will return qr/^#(.*)/.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个预编译的正则表达式，它将匹配与令牌类型相对应的TAP块。例如（不是您真的要注意这一点， $grammar->syntax_for('comment') 将返回 qr/^#(.*)/ 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random fractional number greater than or equal to 0 and less than the value of EXPR. (EXPR should be positive.) If EXPR is omitted, the value 1 is used. Currently EXPR with the value 0 is also special-cased as 1 (this was undocumented before Perl 5.8.0 and is subject to change in future versions of Perl). Automatically calls srand unless srand has already been called. See also srand.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个大于或等于 0 且小于EXPR值的随机小数。（EXPR应该为正。）如果省略EXPR，则使用值 1 。当前，值为 0 的EXPR也被特殊设置为 1 （在Perl 5.8.0之前没有记录，并且在以后的Perl版本中可能会发生变化）。自动调用 srand 除非 srand 已经被调用。另请参阅 srand 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random fractional number greater than or equal to 0 and less than the value of EXPR. (EXPR should be positive.) If EXPR is omitted, the value 1 is used. Currently EXPR with the value 0 is also special-cased as 1 (this was undocumented before Perl 5.8.0 and is subject to change in future versions of Perl). Automatically calls srand unless srand has already been called. See also srand.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个大于或等于 0 且小于EXPR值的随机小数。（EXPR应该为正。）如果省略EXPR，则使用值 1 。当前，值为 0 的 EXPR 也被特殊设置为 1 （在Perl 5.8.0之前没有记录，并且在以后的Perl版本中可能会发生变化）。自动调用 srand 除非 srand 已经被调用。另请参见 srand 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random fractional number greater than or equal to 0 and less than the value of EXPR. (EXPR should be positive.) If EXPR is omitted, the value 1 is used. Currently EXPR with the value 0 is also special-cased as 1 (this was undocumented before Perl 5.8.0 and is subject to change in future versions of Perl). Automatically calls srand unless srand has already been called. See also srand.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个大于或等于 0 且小于EXPR值的随机小数。（EXPR应该为正。）如果省略EXPR，则使用值 1 。当前，值为 0 的 EXPR 也被特殊设置为 1 （在Perl 5.8.0之前没有记录，并且在以后的Perl版本中可能会发生变化）。自动调用 srand 除非 srand 已经被调用。另请参见 srand 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to %hash
trans-unit.target: 返回对%hash的引用

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a HASH where the keys are the message numbers and the values are the References: lines from the articles
trans-unit.target: 返回对HASH的引用,其中键是消息编号,值是来自文章的Reference:行。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a hash where the keys are all the group names which match PATTERN , or all of the groups if no pattern is specified, and each value contains the description text for the group.
trans-unit.target: 返回对哈希的引用，该哈希的键是与 PATTERN 匹配的所有组名，如果未指定任何模式，则为所有组，并且每个值都包含该组的描述文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a hash where the keys are all the group names which match PATTERN and each value is the description text for the group.
trans-unit.target: 返回对哈希的引用，其中键是与 PATTERN 匹配的所有组名，每个值都是该组的描述文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a hash where the keys are all the group names which match PATTERN, or all of the groups if no pattern is specified, and each value contains the description text for the group.
trans-unit.target: 返回对哈希的引用，其中的键是与 PATTERN 匹配的所有组名，如果未指定任何模式，则为所有组，并且每个值都包含该组的描述文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a hash where the keys are all the possible distribution names and the values are the distribution descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 返回对哈希的引用,其中键是所有可能的分发名称,值是分发描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a hash where the keys are the group names and each value is a reference to an array containing the time the groups was created and an identifier, possibly an Email address, of the creator.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个哈希的引用,其中键是组名,每个值是一个数组的引用,包含组的创建时间和一个标识符,可能是创建者的Email地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a hash with keys being features present in current implementation. Several optional features are used in the minimal interface: appname should be present if the first argument to new is recognized, and minline should be present if MinLine method is not dummy. autohistory should be present if lines are put into history automatically (maybe subject to MinLine ), and addhistory if addhistory method is not dummy.
trans-unit.target: 返回对哈希的引用，其中的键是当前实现中存在的功能。几个可选的特征在最小接口用于： appname 中如果第一个参数应存在 new 被识别， minline 应存在如果 MinLine 方法没有虚设。 autohistory 应该存在，如果行被自动放入历史（也许受到 MinLine ）和 addhistory 如果 addhistory 方法不假。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a hash with keys being features present in current implementation. Several optional features are used in the minimal interface: appname should be present if the first argument to new is recognized, and minline should be present if MinLine method is not dummy. autohistory should be present if lines are put into history automatically (maybe subject to MinLine), and addhistory if addhistory method is not dummy.
trans-unit.target: 返回对哈希的引用，该哈希的键是当前实现中存在的功能。几个可选的特征在最小接口用于： appname 中如果第一个参数应存在 new 被识别， minline 应存在如果 MinLine 方法没有虚设。 autohistory 应该存在，如果行被自动放入历史（也许受到 MinLine ）和 addhistory 如果 addhistory 方法不假。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a list containing the lines, or
trans-unit.target: 返回包含行的列表的引用,或

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a list of all the active messages in GROUP , or the current group if GROUP is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 返回到所有的活动消息的列表的参考 GROUP ，或者如果当前组 GROUP 没有被指定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a list of all the active messages in GROUP, or the current group if GROUP is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 返回到所有的活动消息的列表的参考 GROUP ，或者如果当前组 GROUP 没有被指定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a list which contains a list of groups which are recommended for a new user to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表的引用,该列表包含了推荐新用户订阅的组列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a list which contains the message-ids of all news posted after SINCE , that are in a groups which matched GROUPS and a distribution which matches DISTRIBUTIONS .
trans-unit.target: 返回对列表的引用，该列表包含在 SINCE 之后发布的所有新闻的消息ID，这些ID 在与 GROUPS 相匹配的组中，并且与 DISTRIBUTIONS 相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to a list which contains the message-ids of all news posted after SINCE, that are in a groups which matched GROUPS and a distribution which matches DISTRIBUTIONS.
trans-unit.target: 返回对列表的引用，该列表包含在 SINCE 之后发布的所有新闻的消息ID，这些ID在与 GROUPS 相匹配的组中，并且与 DISTRIBUTIONS 相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to an ARRAY of rows, each row is an ARRAY of cells from the above chart, including labels. This:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个ARRAY行的引用,每一行都是上图中单元格的ARRAY,包括标签。这。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to an anonymous subroutine that, when executed, will call CODEREF with the Safe compartment 'in effect'. In other words, with the package namespace adjusted and the opmask enabled.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对匿名子程序的引用,当执行时,该子程序将在安全舱 "生效 "的情况下调用 CODEREF。换句话说,就是调整了包的命名空间并启用了odmask。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to an array where each element, itself an array reference, consists of the three fields of a line of the distrib.pats list maintained by some NNTP servers, namely: a weight, a wildmat and a value which the client may use to construct a Distribution header.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组的引用,其中每个元素本身就是一个数组引用,由一些NNTP服务器维护的distrib.pats列表中的三个字段组成,即:权重、wildmat和一个值,客户端可以用它来构造Distribution头。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to an array which contain the names of the fields returned by xover .
trans-unit.target: 返回对包含 xover 返回的字段名称的数组的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to an array which contain the names of the fields returned by xover.
trans-unit.target: 返回对包含 xover 返回的字段名称的数组的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the %hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回对%hash的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回对哈希的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the object underlying VARIABLE (the same value that was originally returned by the tie call that bound the variable to a package.) Returns the undefined value if VARIABLE isn't tied to a package.
trans-unit.target: 返回对基础变量VARIABLE的引用（与将变量绑定到包的 tie 调用最初返回的值相同）。如果未将VARIABLE绑定到包，则返回未定义的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the object underlying VARIABLE (the same value that was originally returned by the tie call that bound the variable to a package.) Returns the undefined value if VARIABLE isn't tied to a package.
trans-unit.target: 返回对基础变量VARIABLE的引用（与将变量绑定到包的 tie 调用最初返回的值相同）。如果未将VARIABLE绑定到包，则返回未定义的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the object underlying VARIABLE (the same value that was originally returned by the tie call that bound the variable to a package.) Returns the undefined value if VARIABLE isn't tied to a package.
trans-unit.target: 返回对基础变量VARIABLE的引用（与将变量绑定到包的 tie 调用最初返回的值相同）。如果未将VARIABLE绑定到包，则返回未定义的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the regular scalar corresponding to this B::SV object. In other words, this method is the inverse operation to the svref_2object() subroutine. This scalar and other data it points at should be considered read-only: modifying them is neither safe nor guaranteed to have a sensible effect.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个B::SV对象对应的正则标量的引用。换句话说,这个方法是对 svref_2object()子程序的逆操作。这个标量和它所指向的其他数据应该被认为是只读的:修改它们既不安全也不能保证有合理的效果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a scalar that has the value $num in a numeric context and the value $string in a string context.
trans-unit.target: 返回在数字上下文中具有值 $num 和在字符串上下文中具有值 $string 的标量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single, generic OS type for a given operating system name. With no arguments, returns the OS type for the current value of $^O. If the operating system is not recognized, the function will return the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定操作系统名称的单一通用OS类型。不带参数的情况下，返回当前值 $^O 的操作系统类型。如果无法识别操作系统，则该函数将返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sort key.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个排序键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a splice of the array.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string describing what the SV is a reference to.
