trans-unit.source: Returns the current precision. For $x->precision() it will return either the local precision of $x, or if not defined, the global. This means the return value represents the prevision that will be in effect for $x:
trans-unit.target: 返回当前精度。对于 $x->precision() ，它将返回$ x的局部精度，或者返回全局精度（如果未定义）。这意味着返回值表示将对$ x生效的预设：

trans-unit.source: Returns the current priority for a process, a process group, or a user. (See
trans-unit.target: 返回一个进程、一个进程组或一个用户的当前优先级。(参见

trans-unit.source: Returns the current priority for a process, a process group, or a user. (See getpriority(2).) Will raise a fatal exception if used on a machine that doesn't implement getpriority(2).
trans-unit.target: 返回流程，流程组或用户的当前优先级。（请参阅getpriority（2）。）如果在未实现getpriority（2）的计算机上使用，将引发致命异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current process group for the specified PID. Use a PID of 0 to get the current process group for the current process. Will raise an exception if used on a machine that doesn't implement getpgrp(2). If PID is omitted, returns the process group of the current process. Note that the POSIX version of getpgrp does not accept a PID argument, so only PID==0 is truly portable.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定PID的当前过程组。使用 0 的PID来获取当前进程的当前进程组。如果在未实现getpgrp（2）的计算机上使用，将引发异常。如果省略PID，则返回当前进程的进程组。请注意，POSIX版本的 getpgrp 不接受PID参数，因此只有 PID==0 才是真正可移植的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current process group for the specified PID. Use a PID of 0 to get the current process group for the current process. Will raise an exception if used on a machine that doesn't implement getpgrp(2). If PID is omitted, returns the process group of the current process. Note that the POSIX version of getpgrp does not accept a PID argument, so only PID==0 is truly portable.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定PID的当前过程组。使用 0 的PID 来获取当前进程的当前进程组。如果在未实现getpgrp（2）的计算机上使用，将引发异常。如果省略PID，则返回当前进程的进程组。请注意， getpgrp 的POSIX版本不接受PID参数，因此只有 PID==0 才是真正可移植的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current process group for the specified PID. Use a PID of 0 to get the current process group for the current process. Will raise an exception if used on a machine that doesn't implement getpgrp(2). If PID is omitted, returns the process group of the current process. Note that the POSIX version of getpgrp does not accept a PID argument, so only PID==0 is truly portable.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定PID的当前过程组。使用 0 的PID 来获取当前进程的当前进程组。如果在未实现getpgrp（2）的计算机上使用，将引发异常。如果省略PID，则返回当前进程的进程组。请注意， getpgrp 的POSIX版本不接受PID参数，因此只有 PID==0 才是真正可移植的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current time. Example:
trans-unit.target: 返回当前时间。例子:

trans-unit.source: Returns the current uncompressed line number. If EXPR is present it has the effect of setting the line number. Note that setting the line number does not change the current position within the file/buffer being read.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前未压缩的行号。如果存在 EXPR ,则可以设置行号。请注意，设置行号不会更改正在读取的文件/缓冲区中的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the semaphore SEM .
trans-unit.target: 返回信号量 SEM 的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the semaphore SEM.
trans-unit.target: 返回信号量 SEM 的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current version of state storage.
trans-unit.target: 返回状态存储的当前版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current working directory. On error returns undef, with $! set to indicate the error.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前工作目录。出错时返回 undef ，并带有 $! 设置以指示错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently selected filehandle. If FILEHANDLE is supplied, sets the new current default filehandle for output. This has two effects: first, a write or a print without a filehandle default to this FILEHANDLE. Second, references to variables related to output will refer to this output channel.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前选择的文件句柄。如果提供了FILEHANDLE，则设置新的当前默认文件句柄以进行输出。这有两个效果：首先，默认为该FILEHANDLE的没有文件句柄的 write 或 print 。其次，对与输出相关的变量的引用将引用此输出通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently selected filehandle. If FILEHANDLE is supplied, sets the new current default filehandle for output. This has two effects: first, a write or a print without a filehandle default to this FILEHANDLE. Second, references to variables related to output will refer to this output channel.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前选择的文件句柄。如果提供了FILEHANDLE，则设置新的当前默认文件句柄以进行输出。这有两个效果：首先，默认为该FILEHANDLE的不带文件句柄的 write 或 print 。其次，对与输出相关的变量的引用将引用此输出通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently selected filehandle. If FILEHANDLE is supplied, sets the new current default filehandle for output. This has two effects: first, a write or a print without a filehandle default to this FILEHANDLE. Second, references to variables related to output will refer to this output channel.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前选择的文件句柄。如果提供了FILEHANDLE，则设置新的当前默认文件句柄以进行输出。这有两个效果：首先，默认为该FILEHANDLE的不带文件句柄的 write 或 print 。其次，对与输出相关的变量的引用将引用此输出通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data which MakeMaker turns into the META.yml file and the META.json file.
trans-unit.target: 返回MakeMaker变成META.yml文件和META.json文件的数据。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data which MakeMaker turns into the META.yml file and the META.json file. It is always in version 2.0 of the format.
trans-unit.target: 返回MakeMaker变成META.yml文件和META.json文件的数据。它始终是2.0版本的格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data, if any, that is present immediately after the compressed data stream once uncompression is complete.
trans-unit.target: 解压缩完成后,返回紧随压缩数据流之后的数据(如果有)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data, if any, that is present immediately after the compressed data stream once uncompression is complete. It only makes sense to call this method once the end of the compressed data stream has been encountered.
trans-unit.target: 一旦解压缩完成,返回紧随压缩数据流之后存在的数据(如果有的话)。只有在压缩数据流结束后才有意义调用本方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the date on the remote server. This date will be in a UNIX time format (seconds since 1970)
trans-unit.target: 返回远程服务器上的日期。这个日期是UNIX时间格式(1970年以来的秒数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the deflation strategy currently used. Valid values are Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY , Z_FILTERED and Z_HUFFMAN_ONLY .
trans-unit.target: 返回当前使用的放气策略。有效值为 Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY ， Z_FILTERED 和 Z_HUFFMAN_ONLY 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the deflation strategy currently used. Valid values are Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY, Z_FILTERED and Z_HUFFMAN_ONLY.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前使用的放气策略。有效值为 Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY ， Z_FILTERED 和 Z_HUFFMAN_ONLY 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the description of the test, if any. This is the portion after the test number but before the directive.
trans-unit.target: 返回测试的描述,如果有的话。这是测试编号之后、指令之前的部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference between two Benchmark times as a Benchmark object suitable for passing to timestr().
trans-unit.target: 返回两个Benchmark时间的差值,作为一个Benchmark对象,适合传递给 timestr()。

trans-unit.source: Returns the different types of tokens which this grammar can parse.
trans-unit.target: 返回本语法可以解析的不同类型的标记。

trans-unit.source: Returns the digest algorithm for this object. The values are 1, 224, 256, 384, 512, 512224, and 512256 for SHA-1, SHA-224, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512, SHA-512/224, and SHA-512/256, respectively.
Returns the digest encoded as a Base64 string.
trans-unit.target: Returns the digest encoded as a Base64 string。

trans-unit.source: Returns the digest encoded as a binary string.
trans-unit.target: 返回以二进制字符串编码的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Returns the digest encoded as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 返回以十六进制字符串编码的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Returns the directory into which this distribution has been unpacked.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个发行版被解压到的目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the distribution filename without any archive suffix. E.g "Foo-Bar-0.01"
trans-unit.target: 返回不含任何后缀的发行版文件名,如 "Foo-Bar-0.01"。例如:"Foo-Bar-0.01"

trans-unit.source: Returns the domain that the remote SMTP server identified itself as during connection.
trans-unit.target: 返回远程SMTP服务器在连接时识别的域。

trans-unit.source: Returns the double factorial of $x. If $x is an even integer, returns the product of all positive, even integers up to and including $x, i.e., 2*4*6*...*$x. If $x is an odd integer, returns the product of all positive, odd integers, i.e., 1*3*5*...*$x.
trans-unit.target: 返回 $x 的双阶乘。如果 $x 是一个偶数整数，则返回直到 $x 并包括$ x的所有正数，偶数整数的乘积，即2 * 4 * 6 * ... * $ x。如果 $x 是一个奇数整数，则返回所有正整数的乘积，即1 * 3 * 5 * ... * $ x。

trans-unit.source: Returns the double factorial of OBJ. If OBJ is an even integer, returns the product of all positive, even integers up to and including OBJ, i.e., 2*4*6*...*OBJ. If OBJ is an odd integer, returns the product of all positive, odd integers, i.e., 1*3*5*...*OBJ.
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ的双阶乘法。如果OBJ是偶数整数,返回包括OBJ在内的所有正偶数整数的乘积,即2*4*6*...*OBJ。如果OBJ是奇数整数,返回所有正数、奇数整数的乘积,即1*3*5*...*OBJ。

trans-unit.source: Returns the dump of a single scalar without printing. If the second argument is true, the return value does not contain enclosing ticks. Does not handle data structures.
trans-unit.target: 返回单个标量的转储值,不打印。如果第二个参数为真,则返回值不包含包围的ticks。不处理数据结构。

trans-unit.source: Returns the effective group identifier. Similar to Perl' s builtin variable $( , see $EGID in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回有效的组标识符。类似于Perl的内置变量 $( ，请参阅perlvar中的$ EGID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the effective group identifier. Similar to Perl' s builtin variable $(, see "$EGID" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回有效的组标识符。与Perl的内置变量 $( 类似，请参见perlvar中的“ $ EGID”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the effective name of a stash, or NULL if there is none. The effective name represents a location in the symbol table where this stash resides. It is updated automatically when packages are aliased or deleted. A stash that is no longer in the symbol table has no effective name. This name is preferable to HvNAME for use in MRO linearisations and isa caches.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储的有效名称，如果没有，则返回NULL。有效名称表示此隐藏存储在符号表中的位置。当程序包被别名或删除时，它会自动更新。符号表中不再存在的存储区没有有效的名称。对于MRO线性化和isa缓存，此名称比 HvNAME 更可取。

trans-unit.source: Returns the effective user identifier. Identical to Perl's builtin $> variable, see "$EUID" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回有效的用户标识符。与Perl的内置 $> 变量相同，请参见perlvar中的“ $ EUID”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the effective user identifier. Identical to Perl's builtin $> variable, see $EUID in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回有效的用户标识符。与Perl的内置 $> 变量相同，请参见perlvar中的$ EUID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the empty string. Mac OS has no real root directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回空字符串。Mac OS没有真正的根目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the entire perl configuration information in the form of the original config.sh shell variable assignment script.
trans-unit.target: 以原始config.sh shell变量分配脚本的形式返回整个perl配置信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the entry in @dirs (or @INC by default) that contains the module $module. A list of directories can be passed in as an optional parameter, otherwise @INC is searched.
trans-unit.target: 返回 @dirs （或默认为 @INC ）中包含模块 $module 的条目。可以将目录列表作为可选参数传递，否则将搜索@INC。

trans-unit.source: Returns the entry in the list with the highest numerical value. If the list is empty then undef is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表中具有最高数值的条目。如果列表为空，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the entry in the list with the highest numerical value. If the list is empty then undef is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表中具有最高数值的条目。如果列表为空，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the error string for the specified errno. Identical to the string form of $! , see $ERRNO in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定errno的错误字符串。与 $! 的字符串形式相同！，请参阅perlvar中的$ ERRNO。

trans-unit.source: Returns the error string for the specified errno. Identical to the string form of $!, see "$ERRNO" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定errno的错误字符串。与 $! 的字符串形式相同！，请参见perlvar中的“ $ ERRNO”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event mask which represents the events that happened on IO during the last call to poll .
trans-unit.target: 返回事件掩码，该掩码表示上次 poll 调用期间IO上发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event mask which represents the events that happened on IO during the last call to poll.
trans-unit.target: 返回事件掩码，该掩码代表上次 poll 调用期间IO上发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the factorial of $x, i.e., the product of all positive integers up to and including $x.
trans-unit.target: 返回 $x 的阶乘，即直到 $x 并包括$ x的所有正整数的乘积。

trans-unit.source: Returns the factorial of OBJ, i.e., the product of all positive integers up to and including OBJ.
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ的阶乘,即在OBJ范围内所有正整数的乘积。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file descriptor for a filehandle or directory handle, or undefined if the filehandle is not open. If there is no real file descriptor at the OS level, as can happen with filehandles connected to memory objects via open with a reference for the third argument, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件句柄或目录句柄的文件描述符，如果文件句柄未打开，则返回undefined。如果在OS级别上没有真正的文件描述符，则通过 open 并使用第三个参数的引用连接到内存对象的文件句柄可能会发生这种情况，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file descriptor for a filehandle, or undefined if the filehandle is not open. If there is no real file descriptor at the OS level, as can happen with filehandles connected to memory objects via open with a reference for the third argument, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件句柄的文件描述符，如果文件句柄未打开，则返回undefined。如果在OS级别上没有实际的文件描述符，例如通过 open 与第三个参数的引用连接到内存对象的文件句柄可能会发生的情况，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file descriptor for a filehandle, or undefined if the filehandle is not open. If there is no real file descriptor at the OS level, as can happen with filehandles connected to memory objects via open with a reference for the third argument, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件句柄的文件描述符，如果文件句柄未打开，则返回undefined。如果在OS级别上没有实际的文件描述符，例如通过 open 与第三个参数的引用连接到内存对象的文件句柄可能会发生的情况，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file descriptor for the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 返回底层数据库的文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file version number from the VERSIONINFO resource of the executable file or DLL. This is a tuple of four 16 bit numbers. In list context these four numbers will be returned. In scalar context they are concatenated into a string, separated by dots.
trans-unit.target: 返回可执行文件或DLL的VERSIONINFO资源中的文件版本号。这是一个由四个16位数字组成的元组。在列表上下文中,这四个数字将被返回。在标量上下文中,它们被连接成一个字符串,用点分开。

trans-unit.source: Returns the filehandle of a temporary file.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个临时文件的文件柄。

trans-unit.source: Returns the filename of the module found in @INC. The first file found is reported, just as perl itself stops searching @INC once it finds a module.
trans-unit.target: 返回在@INC中找到的模块的文件名。第一个找到的文件会被报告,就像perl自己在找到一个模块后会停止搜索@INC一样。

trans-unit.source: Returns the filename of the module found in PERL5LIB or @INC. The first file found is reported. The advantage of this method over inst_file is that modules that have been tested but not yet installed are included because PERL5LIB keeps track of tested modules.
trans-unit.target: 返回在PERL5LIB或@INC中找到的模块的文件名。报告找到的第一个文件。与 inst_file 相比，此方法的优势在于，由于PERL5LIB跟踪已测试的模块，因此包含了已测试但尚未安装的模块。

trans-unit.source: Returns the filename on CPAN that is associated with the module.
trans-unit.target: 返回CPAN上与该模块相关联的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first $size elements from @list. If $size is negative, returns all but the last $size elements from @list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 @list 中的第一个 $size 元素。如果 $size 为负，则返回 @list 中除最后 $size 元素以外的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first PERL_VERSION where the MODULE was marked as deprecated. Returns undef if the MODULE has not been marked as deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一个PERL_VERSION，其中MODULE被标记为已弃用。如果尚未将MODULE标记为不推荐使用，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first pair of values from the list for which the BLOCK returned true in list context, or an empty list of no such pair was found. In scalar context it returns a simple boolean value, rather than either the key or the value found.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表中的第一对值， BLOCK 在列表上下文中为其返回true，或者没有找到没有该对的空列表。在标量上下文中，它返回一个简单的布尔值，而不是键或找到的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first perl version where the MODULE was marked as deprecated. Returns undef if the MODULE has not been marked as deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 返回将MODULE标记为已弃用的第一个Perl版本。如果尚未将MODULE标记为已弃用，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flags indicating compile-time options that were used to build the zlib library. See the zlib documentation for a description of the flags returned by zlibCompileFlags .
trans-unit.target: 返回标志，这些标志指示用于构建zlib库的编译时选项。有关 zlibCompileFlags 返回的标志的描述，请参见zlib文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flags indicating compile-time options that were used to build the zlib library. See the zlib documentation for a description of the flags returned by zlibCompileFlags.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示用于构建zlib库的编译时选项的标志。有关 zlibCompileFlags 返回的标志的描述，请参见zlib文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns the floating seconds between the two times, which should have been returned by gettimeofday() . If the second argument is omitted, then the current time is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回两次之间的浮动秒数，应该由 gettimeofday() 返回。如果省略第二个参数，则使用当前时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the floating seconds between the two times, which should have been returned by gettimeofday(). If the second argument is omitted, then the current time is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回两次之间的浮动秒数，应该由 gettimeofday() 返回。如果省略第二个参数，则使用当前时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the format if it is valid, NULL if not.
trans-unit.target: 如果有效则返回格式,如果无效则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full compiler call for C programs and stores the definition in CONST_CCCMD.
trans-unit.target: 返回C程序的完整编译器调用,并将定义存储在CONST_CCCMD中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full name of the character indicated by the numeric code. For example,
trans-unit.target: 返回数字代码所表示的字符的全称。例如

trans-unit.source: Returns the full path from the tar header; this is basically a concatenation of the prefix and name fields.
trans-unit.target: 从tar标头返回完整路径；这基本上是 prefix 和 name 字段的串联。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full path of the first occurrence to the file. Package names (eg 'A::B') are automatically converted to directory names in the selected directory. (eg on unix 'A::B' is converted to 'A/B'). Additionally, '.pm', '.pl' and '.pod' are appended to the search automatically if required.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一次出现的文件的完整路径。包名(例如'A::B')会自动转换为所选目录下的目录名。(例如在unix上,'A::B'被转换为'A/B')。此外,'.pm','.pl'和'.pod'会在需要时自动附加到搜索中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full path to the downloaded file on success, and false on failure.
trans-unit.target: 成功时返回下载文件的完整路径,失败时返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full pathname of one of the Windows special folders. The folder will be created if it doesn't exist and the optional CREATE argument is true. The following FOLDER constants are defined by the Win32 module, but only exported on demand:
trans-unit.target: 返回Windows特殊文件夹的完整路径名。如果文件夹不存在,并且可选的CREATE参数为true,则将创建该文件夹。下面的文件夹常量是由Win32模块定义的,但只能按需导出。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full pathname of the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前目录的完整路径名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full pathname to the new directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回新目录的完整路径名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the glob which contains the subroutine to call to invoke the method on the stash . In fact in the presence of autoloading this may be the glob for "AUTOLOAD". In this case the corresponding variable $AUTOLOAD is already setup.
trans-unit.target: 返回glob，其中包含要调用的子例程以调用 stash 上的方法。实际上，在存在自动加载的情况下，这可能是“ AUTOLOAD”的问题。在这种情况下，相应的变量$ AUTOLOAD已被设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the glob which contains the subroutine to call to invoke the method on the stash. In fact in the presence of autoloading this may be the glob for "AUTOLOAD". In this case the corresponding variable $AUTOLOAD is already setup.
trans-unit.target: 返回glob，该glob包含要调用的子例程，以调用 stash 上的方法。实际上，在存在自动加载的情况下，这可能是“ AUTOLOAD”的问题。在这种情况下，已经设置了相应的变量 $AUTOLOAD 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the glob with the given name and a defined subroutine or NULL . The glob lives in the given stash , or in the stashes accessible via @ISA and UNIVERSAL::.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定 name 和定义的子例程或 NULL 的glob 。这个小球位于给定的 stash ，或者存在于可通过@ISA和UNIVERSAL :::访问的存储区中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the glob with the given name and a defined subroutine or NULL. The glob lives in the given stash, or in the stashes accessible via @ISA and UNIVERSAL::.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定 name 和定义的子例程或 NULL 的glob 。这个小球位于给定的 stash ，或者存在于通过 @ISA 和 UNIVERSAL:: 访问的存储区中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the global variable $_.
trans-unit.target: 返回全局变量 $_ 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the greatest common divisor (GCD).
trans-unit.target: 返回最大公因子(GCD)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the greatest common divisor of OBJ1 and OBJ2.
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ1和OBJ2的最大公因子。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash entry which corresponds to the specified key in the hash. hash must be a valid precomputed hash number for the given key , or 0 if you want the function to compute it. IF lval is set then the fetch will be part of a store. Make sure the return value is non-null before accessing it. The return value when hv is a tied hash is a pointer to a static location, so be sure to make a copy of the structure if you need to store it somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 返回与哈希中指定键对应的哈​​希条目。 hash 必须是给定 key 的有效的预先计算的哈希数，如果您希望函数对其进行计算，则为0。如果设置了 lval ，则提取将成为存储的一部分。在访问返回值之前，请确保它不为空。 hv 是绑定哈希时的返回值是指向静态位置的指针，因此如果需要将结构存储在某个位置，请确保对其进行复制。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash entry which corresponds to the specified key in the hash. hash must be a valid precomputed hash number for the given key, or 0 if you want the function to compute it. IF lval is set then the fetch will be part of a store. Make sure the return value is non-null before accessing it. The return value when hv is a tied hash is a pointer to a static location, so be sure to make a copy of the structure if you need to store it somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 返回与哈希中指定键对应的哈​​希条目。 hash 必须是给定 key 的有效的预先计算的哈希数，如果您希望函数对其进行计算，则为0。如果设置了 lval ，则提取将是存储的一部分。在访问返回值之前，请确保它不为空。 hv 是绑定哈希时的返回值是指向静态位置的指针，因此如果需要将结构存储在某个位置，请确保对其进行复制。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash reference from the first matching YAML file that the user has deposited in the prefs_dir/ directory. The first succeeding match wins. The files in the prefs_dir/ are processed alphabetically, and the canonical distro name (e.g. AUTHOR/Foo-Bar-3.14.tar.gz) is matched against the regular expressions stored in the $root->{match}{distribution} attribute value. Additionally all module names contained in a distribution are matched against the regular expressions in the $root->{match}{module} attribute value. The two match values are ANDed together. Each of the two attributes are optional.
trans-unit.target: 从用户存放在 prefs_dir/ 目录中的第一个匹配的YAML文件返回哈希引用。随后的第一场比赛获胜。 prefs_dir/ 中的文件将按字母顺序进行处理，并且规范发行版名称（例如AUTHOR / Foo-Bar-3.14.tar.gz）与$ root-> {match} {distribution}属性值中存储的正则表达式匹配。另外，分发中包含的所有模块名称都与$ root-> {match} {module}属性值中的正则表达式匹配。这两个匹配值进行“与”运算。这两个属性中的每一个都是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash reference that has been announced by a distribution as the requires and build_requires elements. These can be declared either by the META.yml (if authoritative) or can be deposited after the run of Build.PL in the file ./_build/prereqs or after the run of Makfile.PL written as the PREREQ_PM hash in a comment in the produced Makefile .
trans-unit.target: 返回已经被分发宣布为哈希参考 requires 和 build_requires 元素。这些可以由 META.yml 声明（如果具有权威性），也可以在 Build.PL 运行后存放在文件 ./_build/prereqs 中,或者在运行 Makfile.PL 之后存储为注释中的 PREREQ_PM 哈希值。产生的 Makefile 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hexadecimal string representation of the number.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的十六进制字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the highest MSGNUM of all the messages accessed.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有已访问消息中的最高 MSGNUM 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the highest index in the array. The number of elements in the array is av_top_index(av) + 1 . Returns -1 if the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组中的最高索引。数组中的元素数为 av_top_index(av) + 1 。如果数组为空，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the highest index in the array. The number of elements in the array is av_top_index(av) + 1. Returns -1 if the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组中的最高索引。数组中的元素数为 av_top_index(av) + 1 。如果数组为空，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the highest installed version of the bundle in either @INC or $CPAN::Config->{cpan_home} . Note that this is different from CPAN::Module::inst_file.
trans-unit.target: 返回@INC或 $CPAN::Config->{cpan_home} 捆绑软件的最高安装版本。请注意，这与CPAN :: Module :: inst_file不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hostname and service name of the local address (that is, the socket address given by the sockname method).
trans-unit.target: 返回本地地址的主机名和服务名（即 sockname 方法指定的套接字地址）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hostname and service name of the peer address (that is, the socket address given by the peername method), similar to the sockhost_service method.
trans-unit.target: 返回等地址的主机名和服务名称（即由给定的套接字地址 peername 法），类似于 sockhost_service 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ids of the user's supplementary groups. Similar to Perl's builtin variable $) , see $GID in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户的补充组的ID。与Perl的内置变量 $) 类似，请参阅perlvar中的$ GID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ids of the user's supplementary groups. Similar to Perl's builtin variable $), see "$GID" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户的补充组的ID。与Perl的内置变量 $) 类似，请参见perlvar中的“ $ GID”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the input code page used by the console associated with the calling process. To set the console's input code page, see SetConsoleCP(). See also GetConsoleOutputCP(), GetACP() and GetOEMCP().
trans-unit.target: 返回与调用进程相关联的控制台使用的输入代码页。要设置控制台的输入代码页,请参见SetConsoleCP()。也请参见GetConsoleOutputCP()、GetACP()和GetOEMCP()。

trans-unit.source: Returns the input unchanged, but at the same time it gives a branch prediction hint to the compiler that this condition is likely to be false.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入不变,但同时它给编译器一个分支预测的提示,这个条件很可能是假的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the input unchanged, but at the same time it gives a branch prediction hint to the compiler that this condition is likely to be true.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入不变,但同时它给编译器一个分支预测提示,这个条件很可能是真的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer (but still as floating point) nearest to the argument [C99].
trans-unit.target: 返回最接近参数[C99]的整数(但仍然是浮点数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer part and the fraction part. If the fraction part can not be represented as an integer, upgrading is performed or NaN is returned. The output of dparts() corresponds to the output from bdstr().
trans-unit.target: 返回整数部分和小数部分。如果小数部分不能表示为整数，则执行升级或返回NaN。的输出 dparts() 对应于输出从 bdstr() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer portion of EXPR. If EXPR is omitted, uses $_. You should not use this function for rounding: one because it truncates towards 0, and two because machine representations of floating-point numbers can sometimes produce counterintuitive results. For example, int(-6.725/0.025) produces -268 rather than the correct -269; that's because it's really more like -268.99999999999994315658 instead. Usually, the sprintf, printf, or the POSIX::floor and POSIX::ceil functions will serve you better than will int.
trans-unit.target: 返回EXPR的整数部分。如果省略EXPR，则使用 $_ 。您不应该将此函数用于四舍五入：一种是因为它会向 0 截断，另一种是因为浮点数的机器表示有时会产生违反直觉的结果。例如， int(-6.725/0.025) 生成-268而不是正确的-269；那是因为它实际上更像是-268.99999999999994394315658。通常， sprintf ， printf 或 POSIX::floor 和 POSIX::ceil 函数将比 int 更好地为您提供服务。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer portion of EXPR. If EXPR is omitted, uses $_ . You should not use this function for rounding: one because it truncates towards 0 , and two because machine representations of floating-point numbers can sometimes produce counterintuitive results. For example, int(-6.725/0.025) produces -268 rather than the correct -269; that's because it's really more like -268.99999999999994315658 instead. Usually, the sprintf, printf, or the POSIX::floor and POSIX::ceil functions will serve you better than will int().
trans-unit.target: 返回EXPR的整数部分。如果省略EXPR，则使用 $_ 。您不应该将此函数用于四舍五入：一种是因为它会向 0 截断，另一种是因为浮点数的机器表示有时会产生违反直觉的结果。例如， int(-6.725/0.025) 生成-268而不是正确的-269；那是因为它实际上更像是-268.99999999999994394315658。通常， sprintf ， printf 或 POSIX::floor 和 POSIX::ceil 函数会比int（）更好。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer portion of EXPR. If EXPR is omitted, uses $_ . You should not use this function for rounding: one because it truncates towards 0 , and two because machine representations of floating-point numbers can sometimes produce counterintuitive results. For example, int(-6.725/0.025) produces -268 rather than the correct -269; that's because it's really more like -268.99999999999994315658 instead. Usually, the sprintf, printf, or the POSIX::floor and POSIX::ceil functions will serve you better than will int().
trans-unit.target: 返回EXPR的整数部分。如果省略EXPR，则使用 $_ 。您不应该将此函数用于四舍五入：一种是因为它会向 0 截断，另一种是因为浮点数的机器表示有时会产生违反直觉的结果。例如， int(-6.725/0.025) 生成-268而不是正确的-269；那是因为它实际上更像是-268.99999999999994394315658。通常， sprintf ， printf 或 POSIX::floor 和 POSIX::ceil 函数会比int（）更好。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer toward zero from the argument [C99].
trans-unit.target: 返回参数[C99]中向零的整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the key as an SV* , or NULL if the hash entry does not contain an SV* key.
trans-unit.target: 以 SV* 返回密钥，如果哈希条目不包含 SV* 密钥，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the key as an SV* . Will create and return a temporary mortal SV* if the hash entry contains only a char* key.
trans-unit.target: 将密钥作为 SV* 返回。如果哈希条目仅包含 char* 键，则将创建并返回一个临时的 SV* 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the key as an SV* from the current position of the hash iterator. The return value will always be a mortal copy of the key. Also see hv_iterinit .

trans-unit.source: Returns the key as an SV*, or NULL if the hash entry does not contain an SV* key.
trans-unit.target: 以 SV* 返回键；如果哈希条目不包含 SV* 键，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the key as an SV*. Will create and return a temporary mortal SV* if the hash entry contains only a char* key.

trans-unit.target: 从哈希迭代器的当前位置返回密钥。参见 "hv_iterinit" 。

trans-unit.target: 从哈希迭代器的当前位置返回密钥。参见 hv_iterinit 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the key slot of the hash entry as a char* value, doing any necessary dereferencing of possibly SV* keys. The length of the string is placed in len (this is a macro, so do
trans-unit.target: 返回散列条目的键槽作为 char* 值，对可能的 SV* 键进行任何必要的解引用。字符串的长度放在 len 中（这是一个宏，所以

trans-unit.source: Returns the label attached to a cop, and stores its length in bytes into *len.
trans-unit.target: 返回附加到cop的标签，并将其长度（以字节为单位）存储到 *len 中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the label attached to a cop, and stores its length in bytes into *len. Upon return, *flags will be set to either SVf_UTF8 or 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回附加到cop的标签，并将其长度（以字节为单位）存储到 *len 中。返回时， *flags 将设置为 SVf_UTF8 或0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the label attached to a cop.
trans-unit.target: 返回附在副本上的标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns the label attached to a cop. The flags pointer may be set to SVf_UTF8 or 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回附加到警察的标签。标志指针可以设置为 SVf_UTF8 或0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last $size elements from @list. If $size is negative, returns all but the first $size elements from @list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 @list 中最后一个 $size 元素。如果 $size 为负，则返回 @list 中除第一个 $size 元素以外的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last encountered error as string. Pass it a true value to get the Carp::longmess() output instead.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回最后遇到的错误。传递一个真实值以获取 Carp::longmess() 输出。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last error encountered by a routine from this module. It is just like $^E except it isn't changed by anything except routines from this module. Ideally you could just use $^E, but current versions of Perl often overwrite $^E before you get a chance to check it and really old versions of Perl don't really support $^E under Win32.
trans-unit.target: 从此模块返回例程遇到的最后一个错误。就像 $^E 除了该模块中的例程以外，它没有任何改变。理想情况下，您可以只使用 $^E ，但是当前版本的Perl经常会覆盖 $^E 然后才有机会对其进行检查，而真正的旧版本的Perl在Win32下并不真正支持 $^E

trans-unit.source: Returns the last error message generated by zlib.
trans-unit.target: 返回zlib产生的最后一条错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the latest version of this module available on CPAN.
trans-unit.target: 返回CPAN上该模块的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the least common multiple (LCM).
trans-unit.target: 返回最小公倍数(LCM)。

trans-unit.target: 返回长度,单位为

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the stash's effective name.
trans-unit.target: 返回stash的有效名称的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the stash's name.
trans-unit.target: 返回储藏室名称的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the string in the SV. Handles magic and type coercion and sets the UTF8 flag appropriately. See also "SvCUR", which gives raw access to the xpv_cur slot.
trans-unit.target: 返回SV中字符串的长度。处理魔术和强制类型，并适当设置UTF8标志。另请参见 "SvCUR" ，它提供对 xpv_cur 插槽的原始访问。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the string in the SV. Handles magic and type coercion and sets the UTF8 flag appropriately. See also SvCUR , which gives raw access to the xpv_cur slot.
trans-unit.target: 返回SV中字符串的长度。处理魔术和强制类型，并适当设置UTF8标志。另请参见 SvCUR ，它提供对xpv_cur插槽的原始访问。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the string which is in the SV. See "SvLEN".
trans-unit.target: 返回SV中字符串的长度。参见 "SvLEN" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the string which is in the SV. See SvLEN .
trans-unit.target: 返回SV中字符串的长度。参见 SvLEN 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length that the decoded string would have without actually decoding it. This will return the same value as length(decode_base64($str)), but should be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 返回解码后的字符串在没有实际解码的情况下的长度。这将返回与 length(decode_base64($str)) 相同的值，但应该更有效。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length that the decoded string would have without actually decoding it. This will return the same value as length(decode_base64($str)), but should be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 返回解码后的字符串在没有实际解码的情况下的长度。这将返回与 length(decode_base64($str)) 相同的值，但应该更有效。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length that the encoded string would have without actually encoding it. This will return the same value as length(encode_base64($bytes)), but should be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 返回编码的字符串在没有实际编码的情况下的长度。这将返回与 length(encode_base64($bytes)) 相同的值，但应该更有效。

trans-unit.source: Returns the link as contents of L<> . Reciprocal to parse().
trans-unit.target: 返回链接作为 L<> 内容。互为parse（）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the linked-to page or url.
trans-unit.target: 返回链接到的页面或url。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of the keys that are legal in a restricted hash but do not have a value associated to them. Thus if 'foo' is a "hidden" key of the %hash it will return false for both defined and exists tests.
trans-unit.target: 返回在受限哈希中合法但没有关联值的键列表。因此，如果'foo'是％hash的“隐藏”键，则对于已 defined 和 exists 测试，它都将返回false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of the keys that are legal in a restricted hash but do not have a value associated to them. Thus if 'foo' is a "hidden" key of the %hash it will return false for both defined and exists tests.
trans-unit.target: 返回在受限哈希中合法但没有与之关联的值的键的列表。因此，如果'foo'是％hash的“隐藏”键，则对于已 defined 和 exists 测试，它都将返回false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of the keys that are legal in a restricted hash. In the case of an unrestricted hash this is identical to calling keys(%hash).
trans-unit.target: 返回限制性哈希中合法的键的列表。在非限制性哈希的情况下,这与调用 keys(%hash)是一样的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal text of the ok or not ok status.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ok 或 not ok 状态的文字文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a Pod file, given a Pod/module/script name (like "Foo::Bar" or "perlvar" or "perldoc"), and an idea of what files/directories to look in. It searches according to the various options set by the accessors above. (For example, if the inc attribute is on, as it is by default, then the perl @INC directories are implicitly added to the list of directories (if any) that you specify.)
trans-unit.target: 返回Pod文件的位置，给定Pod /模块/脚本名称（例如“ Foo :: Bar”或“ perlvar”或“ perldoc”），并了解要查找的文件/目录。上面的访问器设置的各种选项。（例如，如果默认启用 inc 属性，则将perl @INC目录隐式添加到您指定的目录列表（如果有）。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a pod document given a search directory and a module (e.g. File::Find ) or script (e.g. perldoc ) name.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定搜索目录和模块（例如 File::Find ）或脚本（例如 perldoc ）名称的pod文档的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of the SV in the string delimited by big and bigend (bigend) is the char following the last char). It returns NULL if the string can't be found. The sv does not have to be fbm_compiled, but the search will not be as fast then.
trans-unit.target: 返回SV在字符串中的位置，该字符串由 big 和 bigend 分隔（ bigend ）是最后一个字符之后的字符）。如果找不到该字符串，则返回 NULL 。该 sv 不必被 fbm_compiled ，但搜索不会那么快呢。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of the SV in the string delimited by big and bigend . It returns NULL if the string can't be found. The sv does not have to be fbm_compiled, but the search will not be as fast then.
trans-unit.target: 返回SV在由 big 和 bigend 分隔的字符串中的位置。如果找不到该字符串，则返回 NULL 。该 sv 不必被fbm_compiled，但搜索不会那么快呢。

trans-unit.source: Returns the logarithm of OBJ to base BASE truncted to an integer. This method has two output arguments, the OBJECT and a STATUS. The STATUS is Perl scalar; it is 1 if OBJ is the exact result, 0 if the result was truncted to give OBJ, and undef if it is unknown whether OBJ is the exact result.
trans-unit.target: 返回 OBJ 对基数 BASE 的对数截断为一个整数。本方法有两个输出参数,即 OBJECT 和 STATUS。STATUS是Perl的标量,如果OBJ是精确的结果,则为1;如果结果被截断为OBJ,则为0;如果不知道OBJ是否是精确结果,则为undef。

trans-unit.source: Returns the make variant we're generating the Makefile for. This attempts to do some normalization on the information from %Config or the user.
trans-unit.target: 返回我们要生成Makefile的Make变量。它试图对来自%Config或用户的信息进行一些标准化处理。

trans-unit.source: Returns the message-id of the "current article".
trans-unit.target: 返回 "当前文章 "的消息ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the message-id of the article.
trans-unit.target: 返回文章的message-id。

trans-unit.source: Returns the modular exponentiation, i.e., (OBJ1 ** OBJ2) % OBJ3.
trans-unit.target: 返回模块指数,即(OBJ1 **OBJ2)% OBJ3。

trans-unit.source: Returns the modular multiplicative inverse, i.e., return OBJ3 so that
trans-unit.target: 返回模块化乘法反,即返回OBJ3,使

trans-unit.source: Returns the module name of the JSON decoder. Unlike "json_backend", this is not necessarily a full JSON-style module, but only something that will provide a decode_json subroutine. If CPAN_META_JSON_DECODER is set, this will be whatever that's set to. If not, this will be whatever has been selected as "json_backend". See "ENVIRONMENT" for more notes.
trans-unit.target: 返回JSON解码器的模块名称。与“ json_backend”不同的是，这不一定是完整的JSON样式的模块，而只是提供了 decode_json 子例程的某些模块。如果设置了 CPAN_META_JSON_DECODER ，则将设置为该值。如果不是，则将其选择为“ json_backend”。有关更多说明，请参见“环境”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the module name of the JSON serializer. If CPAN_META_JSON_BACKEND is set, this will be whatever that's set to. If not, this will either be JSON::PP or JSON. If PERL_JSON_BACKEND is set, this will return JSON as further delegation is handled by the JSON module. See "ENVIRONMENT" for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回JSON序列化器的模块名称。如果设置了 CPAN_META_JSON_BACKEND ，则将设置为该值。如果不是，则为JSON :: PP或JSON。如果设置了 PERL_JSON_BACKEND ，则将返回JSON，因为进一步的委托由JSON模块处理。有关详情，请参见“环境”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the module name of the JSON serializer. This will either be JSON::PP or JSON. Even if PERL_JSON_BACKEND is set, this will return JSON as further delegation is handled by the JSON module. See ENVIRONMENT for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回JSON序列化器的模块名称。这将是JSON :: PP或JSON。即使设置了 PERL_JSON_BACKEND ，由于进一步的委托由JSON模块处理，它也会返回JSON。有关详细信息，请参见环境。

trans-unit.source: Returns the module name of the YAML serializer. See "ENVIRONMENT" for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回YAML序列化器的模块名称。有关详情，请参见“环境”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the module name of the YAML serializer. See ENVIRONMENT for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回YAML序列化器的模块名称。有关详细信息，请参见环境。

trans-unit.source: Returns the most significant digit of the current status code. If a command is pending then CMD_PENDING is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前状态码的最高有效位。如果命令待处理，则返回 CMD_PENDING 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mount type and flags for a specified mount point. A comma-separated string of mntent->mnt_type (always "system" or "user"), then the mntent->mnt_opts, where the first is always "binmode" or "textmode".
trans-unit.target: 返回指定安装点的安装类型和标志。逗号分隔的mntent-> mnt_type字符串（总是“ system”或“ user”），然后是mntent-> mnt_opts，其中第一个始终是“ binmode”或“ textmode”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mro linearisation for the given stash. By default, this will be whatever mro_get_linear_isa_dfs returns unless some other MRO is in effect for the stash. The return value is a read-only AV*.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定存储的mro线性化。默认情况下，这将是 mro_get_linear_isa_dfs 返回的结果，除非对该存储有效的其他一些MRO。返回值是只读AV *。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mtime of the test, in seconds from the epoch.
trans-unit.target: 返回测试的mtime,从时间点算起,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the multiplicative inverse of $x modulo $mod . If
trans-unit.target: 返回 $x 模 $mod 的乘法逆。如果

trans-unit.source: Returns the multiplicative inverse of $x modulo $mod. If
trans-unit.target: 返回 $x 模 $mod 的乘法逆。如果

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a lexical sub, otherwise undef.
trans-unit.target: 返回词 undef 的名称，否则返回undef。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a lexical sub, otherwise undef.
trans-unit.target: 返回词 undef 的名称，否则返回undef。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the C type as it was set on construction.
trans-unit.target: 返回构造时设置的C类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the XS type of the INPUT map.
trans-unit.target: 返回INPUT地图的XS类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the XS type of the OUTPUT map.
trans-unit.target: 返回 OUTPUT 地图的 XS 类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the XS type that this C type is associated to.
trans-unit.target: 返回此C类型所关联的XS类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the class used for tracking individual tests. This class should either subclass from App::Prove::State::Result::Test or provide an identical interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于跟踪单个测试的类的名称。此类应为 App::Prove::State::Result::Test 子类，或提供相同的接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the current builder. Top level builders default to $0 (the name of the executable). Child builders are named via the child method. If no name is supplied, will be named "Child of $parent->name".
trans-unit.target: 返回当前构建器的名称。顶级构建器默认为 $0 （可执行文件的名称）。子构建器通过 child 方法命名。如果未提供名称，则将其命名为“ $ parent-> name的子代”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the current working directory. See also Cwd.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前工作目录的名称。另请参阅Cwd。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the file on the server.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器上文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the given $code reference, if it has one. Normal named subs will give a fully-qualified name consisting of the package and the localname separated by ::. Anonymous code references will give __ANON__ as the localname. If the package the code was compiled in has been deleted (e.g. using delete_package from Symbol), __ANON__ will be returned as the package name. If a name has been set using "set_subname", this name will be returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的 $code 引用的名称（如果有）。普通命名的subs将给出由包和以 :: 分隔的本地名称组成的全限定名称。匿名代码引用将使用 __ANON__ 作为本地名称。如果代码被编译在程序包已经（例如，使用被删除 delete_package 从符号）， __ANON__ 将返回作为包名。如果使用“ set_subname”设置了名称，则将返回该名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the input file being read.
trans-unit.target: 返回正在读取的输入文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the last file stored on the server using the STOU command.
trans-unit.target: 使用 STOU 命令返回存储在服务器上的最后一个文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the output file being written.
trans-unit.target: 返回正在写入的输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the package represented by this module. If there is more than one package, it makes a best guess based on the filename. If it's a script (i.e. not a *.pm) the package name is 'main'.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个模块所代表的软件包的名称。如果有多个包,它会根据文件名做一个最佳猜测。如果它是一个脚本(即不是一个*.pm),那么包名就是'main'。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the temporary directory created.
trans-unit.target: 返回创建的临时目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the native code point of the first character in the string s which is assumed to be in UTF-8 encoding; send points to 1 beyond the end of s. *retlen will be set to the length, in bytes, of that character.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串 s 中第一个字符的本机代码点，假定该字符串以UTF-8编码；在 s 的末尾 send 点发送到1 。 *retlen 将设置为该字符的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the native code point of the first character in the string s which is assumed to be in UTF-8 encoding; retlen will be set to the length, in bytes, of that character.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串 s 中第一个字符的本机代码点，假定该字符串以UTF-8编码； retlen 将设置为该字符的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the native code point of the first character in the string s which is assumed to be in UTF-8 encoding; retlen will be set to the length, in bytes, of that character.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串 s 中第一个字符的本机代码点，假定该字符串以UTF-8编码； retlen 将设置为该字符的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the native code point of the first character in the string s which is assumed to be in UTF-8 encoding; send points to 1 beyond the end of s. *retlen will be set to the length, in bytes, of that character.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串 s 中第一个字符的本机代码点，假定该字符串以UTF-8编码；在 s 的末尾 send 点数发送到1 。 *retlen 将设置为该字符的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the native equivalent of the input Latin-1 code point (including ASCII and control characters) given by ch. Thus, LATIN1_TO_NATIVE(66) on EBCDIC platforms returns 194. These each represent the character "B" on their respective platforms. On ASCII platforms no conversion is needed, so this macro expands to just its input, adding no time nor space requirements to the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ch 给定的输入Latin-1代码点（包括ASCII和控制字符）的本机等效项。因此，EBCDIC平台上的 LATIN1_TO_NATIVE(66) 返回194。它们各自在各自的平台上代表字符 "B" 。在ASCII平台上，不需要转换，因此此宏扩展为仅其输入，而对实现没有任何时间和空间要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns the native equivalent of the input Unicode code point given by ch. Thus, UNI_TO_NATIVE(68) on EBCDIC platforms returns 196. These each represent the character "D" on their respective platforms. On ASCII platforms no conversion is needed, so this macro expands to just its input, adding no time nor space requirements to the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ch 给定的输入Unicode代码点的本机等效项。因此，EBCDIC平台上的 UNI_TO_NATIVE(68) 返回196。它们各自在各自的平台上代表字符 "D" 。在ASCII平台上，不需要转换，因此此宏扩展为仅其输入，而对实现没有任何时间和空间要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new position, or the undefined value on failure. A position of zero is returned as the string "0 but true" ; thus sysseek returns true on success and false on failure, yet you can still easily determine the new position.

trans-unit.source: Returns the next character from the input file attached to FILEHANDLE, or the undefined value at end of file or if there was an error (in the latter case $! is set). If FILEHANDLE is omitted, reads from STDIN. This is not particularly efficient. However, it cannot be used by itself to fetch single characters without waiting for the user to hit enter. For that, try something more like:
trans-unit.target: 返回附加到FILEHANDLE的输入文件中的下一个字符，或者返回文件末尾的未定义值，或者返回错误（在后一种情况下，设置 $! ）。如果省略FILEHANDLE，则从STDIN读取。这不是特别有效。但是，如果不等待用户按下Enter键，就不能单独使用它来获取单个字符。为此，请尝试更类似的方法：

trans-unit.source: Returns the next directory entry for a directory opened by opendir. If used in list context, returns all the rest of the entries in the directory. If there are no more entries, returns the undefined value in scalar context and the empty list in list context.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 opendir 打开的目录的下一个目录条目。如果在列表上下文中使用，则返回目录中的所有其余条目。如果没有更多条目，则在标量上下文中返回未定义的值，在列表上下文中返回空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next directory entry for a directory opened by opendir. If used in list context, returns all the rest of the entries in the directory. If there are no more entries, returns the undefined value in scalar context and the empty list in list context.

trans-unit.source: Returns the next representable floating point number after x in the direction of y [C99].

trans-unit.source: Returns the null list for the MacPerl application, since the concept is usually meaningless under Mac OS. But if you're using the MacPerl tool under MPW, it gives back $ENV{Commands} suitably split, as is done in :lib:ExtUtils:MM_Mac.pm.
trans-unit.target: 返回MacPerl应用程序的空列表,因为这个概念在Mac OS下通常没有意义。但如果你在 MPW 下使用 MacPerl 工具,它将返回 $ENV{Commands}适当拆分,就像 :lib:ExtUtils:MM_Mac.pm 所做的那样。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number for the protocol being used on the socket, if known. If the protocol is unknown, as with an AF_UNIX socket, zero is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回套接字上正在使用的协议的编号（如果已知）。如果协议是未知的（如使用 AF_UNIX 套接字），则返回零。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number for the socket domain type. For example, for an AF_INET socket the value of &AF_INET will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回套接字域类型的数字。例如，对于 AF_INET 套接字，将返回 &AF_INET 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number for the socket type. For example, for a SOCK_STREAM socket the value of &SOCK_STREAM will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回套接字类型的数字。例如，对于 SOCK_STREAM 套接字，将返回 &SOCK_STREAM 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of UTF-8 characters between the UTF-8 pointers a and b .
trans-unit.target: 返回UTF-8指针 a 和 b 之间的UTF-8字符数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of UTF-8 characters between the UTF-8 pointers a and b.
trans-unit.target: 返回UTF-8指针 a 和 b 之间的UTF-8字符数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes actually read. On EOF it returns 0 and in the case of an error, -1.
trans-unit.target: 返回实际读取的字节数。EOF时返回0,如果出现错误,则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes beginning at s which form a legal UTF-8 (or UTF-EBCDIC) encoded character, looking no further than e - s bytes into s. Returns 0 if the sequence starting at s through e - 1 is not well-formed UTF-8
trans-unit.target: 返回的字节开始于数 s 其形成合法UTF-8（或UTF-EBCDIC）编码的字符，查找没有比 e - s 字节到 s 。如果从 s 到 e - 1 的序列格式不正确的UTF-8，则返回0

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes in the converted string (not including the spares).
trans-unit.target: 返回转换后的字符串的字节数(不包括备用字节)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes in the converted string.
trans-unit.target: 返回转换后的字符串的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes read before any <CRLF> translation.
trans-unit.target: 返回任何<CRLF>转换之前读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes read so far.
trans-unit.target: 返回目前读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes written before any <CRLF> translation.
trans-unit.target: 返回在任何<CRLF>转换之前写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters in the sequence of UTF-8-encoded bytes starting at s and ending at the byte just before e. If <s> and <e> point to the same place, it returns 0 with no warning raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回以UTF-8编码的字节序列的字符数，从 s 开始，直到 e 之前的字节结束。如果<s>和<e>指向同一位置，则它返回0，并且不发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters in the string in an SV, counting wide UTF-8 bytes as a single character. Handles magic and type coercion.
trans-unit.target: 返回SV中字符串的字符数,将宽UTF-8字节算作一个字符。处理魔术和类型强制。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of digest bits for this object. The values are 160, 224, 256, 384, 512, 224, and 256 for SHA-1, SHA-224, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512, SHA-512/224 and SHA-512/256, respectively.

Returns the number of digits in the decimal representation of the number. In list context, returns the length of the integer and fraction part. For BigInt's, the length of the fraction part will always be 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回数字的十进制表示中的位数。在列表上下文中,返回整数和分数部分的长度。对于BigInt's,分数部分的长度总是0。

trans-unit.target: Returns the number of iterations.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of messages in the mailbox. However if there are no messages on the server the string "0E0" will be returned. This is will give a true value in a boolean context, but zero in a numeric context.
trans-unit.target: 返回邮箱中的邮件数。但是，如果服务器上没有消息，则将返回字符串 "0E0" 。在布尔上下文中这将给出一个真值，而在数字上下文中这将给出零。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of non-leap seconds since whatever time the system considers to be the epoch, suitable for feeding to gmtime and localtime. On most systems the epoch is 00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970; a prominent exception being Mac OS Classic which uses 00:00:00, January 1, 1904 in the current local time zone for its epoch.
trans-unit.target: 返回自系统认为适合于纪元的任何时间以来的非number秒数，适用于馈给 gmtime 和 localtime 。在大多数系统上，纪元是1970年1月1日世界标准时间00:00:00；一个明显的例外是Mac OS Classic，它在当前当地时区使用1904年1月1日的00:00:00。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of non-leap seconds since whatever time the system considers to be the epoch, suitable for feeding to gmtime and localtime.
