trans-unit.source: Returns the offset in the bottom pad of the lex or the fake lex. cv is the CV in which to start the search, and seq is the current cop_seq to match against. If warn is true, print appropriate warnings. The out_* vars return values, and so are pointers to where the returned values should be stored. out_capture, if non-null, requests that the innermost instance of the lexical is captured; out_name is set to the innermost matched pad name or fake pad name; out_flags returns the flags normally associated with the PARENT_FAKELEX_FLAGS field of a fake pad name.
trans-unit.target: 返回lex或假lex的底部填充中的偏移量。 cv 是开始搜索的CV，而seq是要 cop_seq 匹配的当前cop_seq。如果 warn 为true，请打印适当的警告。该 out_ *瓦尔返回值，所以是在何处返回的值应该存储。 out_capture ，如果非null，则请求捕获词法的最内层实例； out_name 设置为最里面匹配的填充名称或假填充名称； out_flags 返回通常与假垫名称的 PARENT_FAKELEX_FLAGS 字段关联的标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the offset in the bottom pad of the lex or the fake lex. cv is the CV in which to start the search, and seq is the current cop_seq to match against. If warn is true, print appropriate warnings. The out_* vars return values, and so are pointers to where the returned values should be stored. out_capture, if non-null, requests that the innermost instance of the lexical is captured; out_name is set to the innermost matched pad name or fake pad name; out_flags returns the flags normally associated with the PARENT_FAKELEX_FLAGS field of a fake pad name.
trans-unit.target: cv是开始搜索的CV,seq是当前要匹配的cop_seq。如果 warn 为真,则打印相应的警告。out_*变量返回值,因此是指向返回值应该存储在哪里的指针。out_capture,如果非空,则请求捕获词库的最内层实例;out_name设置为最内层匹配的垫名或假垫名;out_flags返回通常与假垫名的PARENT_FAKELEX_FLAGS字段相关联的标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the offset of where the last m//g search left off for the variable in question ($_ is used when the variable is not specified). Note that 0 is a valid match offset. undef indicates that the search position is reset (usually due to match failure, but can also be because no match has yet been run on the scalar).
trans-unit.target: 返回有关变量最后一次 m//g 搜索的偏移量（未指定变量时使用 $_ ）。请注意，0是有效的匹配偏移量。 undef 表示搜索位置已重置（通常是由于匹配失败，但也可能是因为尚未在标量上运行任何匹配）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the offset of where the last m//g search left off for the variable in question ($_ is used when the variable is not specified). Note that 0 is a valid match offset. undef indicates that the search position is reset (usually due to match failure, but can also be because no match has yet been run on the scalar).
trans-unit.target: 返回有关变量最后一次 m//g 搜索的偏移量（未指定变量时使用 $_ ）。请注意，0是有效的匹配偏移量。 undef 表示搜索位置已重置（通常是由于匹配失败，但也可能是因为尚未在标量上运行任何匹配）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the offset of where the last m//g search left off for the variable in question ($_ is used when the variable is not specified). This offset is in characters unless the (no-longer-recommended) use bytes pragma is in effect, in which case the offset is in bytes. Note that 0 is a valid match offset. undef indicates that the search position is reset (usually due to match failure, but can also be because no match has yet been run on the scalar).
trans-unit.target: 返回最后一个 m//g 搜索到该变量的位置的偏移量（未指定变量时使用 $_ ）。除非有效（不再推荐） use bytes 杂注有效，否则此偏移量以字符为单位，在这种情况下，偏移量以字节为单位。请注意，0是有效的匹配偏移量。 undef 表示搜索位置已重置（通常是由于匹配失败，但也可能是因为尚未在标量上运行任何匹配）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the original line of text which was parsed.
trans-unit.target: 返回被解析的原始文本行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the original name which was trimmed to $trimmed by a previous call to addsym(), or undef if $trimmed does not correspond to a member of this set of symbols. This method must be called via an existing object.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过先前对addsymym（）的调用将原始名称修整为 $trimmed trimmed的名称，如果 $trimmed trimmed不对应于该符号集的成员，则返回 undef 。必须通过现有对象调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output code page used by the console associated with the calling process. To set the console's output code page, see SetConsoleOutputCP(). See also GetConsoleCP(), GetACP(), and GetOEMCP().
trans-unit.target: 返回与调用进程相关联的控制台使用的输出代码页。要设置控制台的输出代码页,请参阅SetConsoleOutputCP()。也请参见GetConsoleCP()、GetACP()和GetOEMCP()。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output filehandle object.
trans-unit.target: 返回输出文件柄对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the package name of a stash, or NULL if stash isn't a stash. See "SvSTASH", "CvSTASH".
trans-unit.target: 返回存储的软件包名称，如果 stash 不是存储，则返回 NULL 。请参见 "SvSTASH" ， "CvSTASH" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the package name of a stash, or NULL if stash isn't a stash. See SvSTASH , CvSTASH .
trans-unit.target: 返回存储的软件包名称，如果 stash 不是存储，则返回NULL 。参见 SvSTASH 和 CvSTASH 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the packed sockaddr address of the other end of the socket connection. It calls getpeername.
trans-unit.target: 返回套接字连接另一端的打包的 sockaddr 地址。它调用 getpeername 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the packed sockaddr address of this end of the connection. It's the same as getsockname(2).
trans-unit.target: 返回连接此端的打包的 sockaddr 地址。它与 getsockname(2) 相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the packed sockaddr address of the other end of the SOCKET connection.
trans-unit.target: 返回SOCKET连接另一端的打包sockaddr地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns the packed sockaddr address of this end of the SOCKET connection, in case you don't know the address because you have several different IPs that the connection might have come in on.
trans-unit.target: Returns the packed sockaddr address of this end of the SOCKET connection,case you don't know the address because you have several different IPs that the connection might have come in on.

trans-unit.source: Returns the pad name as a mortal SV.
trans-unit.target: 返回垫子名称为凡人SV。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent Test::Builder instance, if any. Only used with child builders for nested TAP.
trans-unit.target: 返回父 Test::Builder 实例（如果有）。仅与子生成器一起用于嵌套TAP。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent OP of o, if it has a parent. Returns NULL otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 返回 o 的父OP ，如果它有父。否则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent OP of o, if it has a parent. Returns NULL otherwise. This function is only available on perls built with -DPERL_OP_PARENT .
trans-unit.target: 如果有父级，则返回o的父级OP。否则返回NULL。此功能仅在使用-DPERL_OP_PARENT构建的 -DPERL_OP_PARENT 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path name to the file on the server which contains the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器上包含指定信息的文件的路径名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path to a module given the module or package name. A list of directories can be passed in as an optional parameter, otherwise @INC is searched.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定模块或包名的模块的路径。可以将目录列表作为可选参数传入,否则将搜索@INC。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pathanme to the fifo at the peer end
trans-unit.target: 将路径返回给对等端的fiftho。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pathname to the fifo at the local end
trans-unit.target: 返回本地端的fiftho路径名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the paths to the root directories of all logical drives currently defined. This includes all types of drive letters, such as floppies, CD-ROMs, hard disks, and network shares. A typical return value on a poorly equipped computer would be ("A:\\","C:\\").
trans-unit.target: 返回当前定义的所有逻辑驱动器的根目录的路径。这包括所有类型的驱动器号，例如软盘，CD-ROM，硬盘和网络共享。设备差的计算机上的典型返回值将是 ("A:\\","C:\\") 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the first occurence of the byte c in the literal string "list", or NULL if c doesn't appear in "list". All bytes are treated as unsigned char. Thus this macro can be used to determine if c is in a set of particular characters. Unlike strchr(3), it works even if c is NUL (and the set doesn't include NUL).
trans-unit.target: 返回文字字符串 "list" 字节 c 第一次出现的位置，如果 c 未出现在 "list" ，则返回NULL 。所有字节均视为无符号字符。因此，该宏可用于确定 c 是否在一组特定字符中。与strchr（3）不同，即使 c 为 NUL （并且该集合不包含 NUL ），它也可以工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process id of the last process that performed an operation on the semaphore SEM .
trans-unit.target: 返回对信号量 SEM 执行操作的最后一个进程的进程ID 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process id of the last process that performed an operation on the semaphore SEM.
trans-unit.target: 返回对信号量 SEM 执行操作的最后一个进程的进程ID 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process id of the parent process.
trans-unit.target: 返回父进程的进程ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier of the current process. Until the process terminates, the process identifier uniquely identifies the process throughout the system.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前进程的进程标识符。在进程结束之前,进程标识符在整个系统中唯一地标识该进程。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier. Identical to Perl's builtin variable $$ , see $PID in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回进程标识符。与Perl的内置变量 $$ 相同，请参见perlvar中的$ PID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier. Identical to Perl's builtin variable $$, see "$PID" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回进程标识符。与Perl的内置变量 $$ 相同，请参见perlvar中的“ $ PID”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the processor type: 386, 486 or 586 for x86 processors, 8664 for the x64 processor and 2200 for the Itanium. Since it returns the native processor type it will return a 64-bit processor type even when called from a 32-bit Perl running on 64-bit Windows.
trans-unit.target: 返回处理器类型。对于x86处理器,返回386、486或586;对于x64处理器,返回8664;对于Itanium处理器,返回2200。由于它返回的是原生处理器类型,所以即使在64位Windows上运行的32位Perl中调用它,也会返回64位处理器类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prototype of a function as a string (or undef if the function has no prototype). FUNCTION is a reference to, or the name of, the function whose prototype you want to retrieve. If FUNCTION is omitted, $_ is used.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回函数的原型（如果该函数没有原型，则返回 undef ）。FUNCTION是对要检索其原型的函数的引用或名称。如果省略FUNCTION，则使用 $_ 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prototype of a function as a string (or undef if the function has no prototype). FUNCTION is a reference to, or the name of, the function whose prototype you want to retrieve. If FUNCTION is omitted, $_ is used.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回函数的原型（如果函数没有原型，则返回 undef ）。FUNCTION是对要检索其原型的函数的引用或名称。如果省略FUNCTION，则使用$ _。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prototype of a function as a string (or undef if the function has no prototype). FUNCTION is a reference to, or the name of, the function whose prototype you want to retrieve. If FUNCTION is omitted, $_ is used.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回函数的原型（如果函数没有原型，则返回 undef ）。FUNCTION是对要检索其原型的函数的引用或名称。如果省略FUNCTION，则使用$ _。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prototype of the given $code reference, if it has one, as a string. This is the same as the CORE::prototype operator; it is included here simply for symmetry and completeness with the other functions.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回给定的 $code 引用的原型（如果有）。这与 CORE::prototype 运算符相同；此处仅出于对称性和与其他功能的完整性而将其包括在内。

trans-unit.source: Returns the raw value in the SV's IV slot, without checks or conversions. Only use when you are sure SvIOK is true. See also "SvIV".
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的IV插槽中的原始值，而不进行检查或转换。仅在确定 SvIOK 为true时使用。另请参见 "SvIV" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the raw value in the SV's IV slot, without checks or conversions. Only use when you are sure SvIOK is true. See also SvIV() .
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的IV插槽中的原始值，而不进行检查或转换。仅在确定SvIOK为true时使用。另请参见 SvIV() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the raw value in the SV's NV slot, without checks or conversions. Only use when you are sure SvNOK is true. See also "SvNV".
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的NV插槽中的原始值，而不进行检查或转换。仅在确定 SvNOK 为真时使用。另请参见 "SvNV" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the raw value in the SV's NV slot, without checks or conversions. Only use when you are sure SvNOK is true. See also SvNV() .
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的NV插槽中的原始值，而不进行检查或转换。仅在确定SvNOK为真时使用。另请参见 SvNV() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the raw value in the SV's UV slot, without checks or conversions. Only use when you are sure SvIOK is true. See also "SvUV".
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的UV插槽中的原始值，而不进行检查或转换。仅在确定 SvIOK 为true时使用。另请参见 "SvUV" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the raw value in the SV's UV slot, without checks or conversions. Only use when you are sure SvIOK is true. See also SvUV() .
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的UV插槽中的原始值，而不进行检查或转换。仅在确定SvIOK为true时使用。另请参见 SvUV() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the realclean_subdirs target. This is used by the realclean target to call realclean on any subdirectories which contain Makefiles.
trans-unit.target: 返回realclean_subdirs目标。这个目标被realclean target用来调用包含Makefiles的子目录的realclean。

trans-unit.source: Returns the reference address of a reference $obj. If $obj is not a reference, returns $obj.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个引用$obj的引用地址,如果$obj不是引用,则返回$obj。如果$obj不是引用,返回$obj。

trans-unit.source: Returns the remainder of the FQDN after the
trans-unit.target: 返回FQDN的剩余部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns the remainer after truncated division (T-division). See "btdiv()".
trans-unit.target: 返回截断后的余数（T除法）。参见“ btdiv（）”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the remaining time in the alarm in microseconds, or undef if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 返回警报中的剩余时间（以微秒为单位）；如果发生错误，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the remaining time in the alarm in microseconds, or undef if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 返回警报中的剩余时间（以微秒为单位）；如果发生错误，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the remaining time in the alarm in seconds, or undef if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 以秒为单位返回警报中的剩余时间，如果发生错误，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the remaining time in the alarm in seconds, or undef if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 以秒为单位返回警报中的剩余时间，如果发生错误，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result after decrementing OBJ by one.
trans-unit.target: 将OBJ递减1后返回结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result after incrementing OBJ by one.
trans-unit.target: 将OBJ递增一后返回结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result after shifting OBJ N digits to the left in base B. This is equivalent to multiplying by B**N, except that it might be much faster.
trans-unit.target: 返回以B为基数将OBJ的N位数字向左移动后的结果,这相当于乘以B**N,只是速度更快。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result after shifting OBJ N digits to thee right in base B. This is equivalent to performing integer division by B**N and discarding the remainder, except that it might be much faster.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于用B**N进行整数除法并丢弃剩余的部分,只是它可能会快得多。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of adding OBJ2 to OBJ1.
trans-unit.target: 返回在OBJ1上添加OBJ2的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of dividing OBJ1 by OBJ2 and truncating the result to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ1除以OBJ2并将结果截断为整数的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of multiplying OBJ2 and OBJ1.
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ2和OBJ1相乘的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of subtracting OBJ2 by OBJ1. If flag is false or omitted, OBJ1 might be modified. If flag is true, OBJ2 might be modified.
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ1减去OBJ2的结果。如果 flag 为false或省略，则可能会修改OBJ1。如果 flag 为true，则可以修改OBJ2。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of the last call to the BLOCK . If @list is empty then undef is returned. If @list only contains one element then that element is returned and BLOCK is not executed.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 BLOCK 的最后一次调用的结果。如果 @list 为空，则返回 undef 。如果 @list 仅包含一个元素，则返回该元素，并且不执行 BLOCK 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of the last call to the BLOCK. If @list is empty then undef is returned. If @list only contains one element then that element is returned and BLOCK is not executed.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 BLOCK 的最后一次调用的结果。如果 @list 为空，则返回 undef 。如果 @list 仅包含一个元素，则返回该元素，并且不执行 BLOCK 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the revision number of UTS #10 this module consults, that should correspond with the DUCET incorporated.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个模块所参考的UTS #10的修订号,它应该与纳入的DUCET相对应。

trans-unit.source: Returns the root op (i.e. an object in the appropriate B::OP-derived class) of the main part of the Perl program.
trans-unit.target: 返回Perl程序主体部分的根运算(即在适当的B::OP派生类中的一个对象)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the self object on success, undefined on error.
trans-unit.target: 成功时返回self对象,错误时不定义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the shared memory identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回共享内存标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sibling of o, or NULL if there is no sibling
trans-unit.target: 返回 o 的同级，如果没有同级，则返回 NULL

trans-unit.source: Returns the sibling of o, or NULL if there is no sibling
trans-unit.target: 返回o的兄弟姐妹,如果没有兄弟姐妹,则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the significand (mantissa) and exponent corresponding to engineering notation. In scalar context, only the significand is returned. For finite non-zero numbers, the significand's absolute value is greater than or equal to 1 and less than 1000, and the exponent is a multiple of 3. The output of eparts() corresponds to the output from bestr(). In Math::BigInt, if the significand can not be represented as an integer, upgrading is performed or NaN is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回与工程表示法相对应的有效数字（尾数）和指数。在标量上下文中，仅返回有效数。对于有限的非零数，有效数字的绝对值大于或等于1且小于1000，且指数为3的倍数的输出 eparts() 对应于输出从 bestr() 。在Math :: BigInt中，如果有效位数不能表示为整数，则执行升级或返回NaN。

trans-unit.source: Returns the significand (mantissa) and exponent corresponding to normalized notation. In scalar context, only the significand is returned. For finite non-zero numbers, the significand's absolute value is greater than or equal to 1 and less than 10. The output of nparts() corresponds to the output from bnstr(). In Math::BigInt, if the significand can not be represented as an integer, upgrading is performed or NaN is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回有效值（尾数）和对应于规范化表示法的指数。在标量上下文中，仅返回有效数。对于有限的非零数，有效数字的绝对值大于或等于1并且小于10少的输出 nparts() 从对应的输出 bnstr() 。在Math :: BigInt中，如果有效位数不能表示为整数，则执行升级或返回NaN。

trans-unit.source: Returns the significand (mantissa) and the exponent as integers. In Math::BigFloat, both are returned as Math::BigInt objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回整数的意义(mantissa)和指数。在 Math::BigFloat 中,两者都以 Math::BigInt 对象返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the significand (mantissa) and the exponent as integers. In scalar context, only the significand is returned. The significand is the integer with the smallest absolute value. The output of sparts() corresponds to the output from bsstr().
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回有效数字（尾数）和指数。在标量上下文中，仅返回有效数。有效数字是绝对值最小的整数。的输出 sparts() 对应于输出从 bsstr() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sine of EXPR (expressed in radians). If EXPR is omitted, returns sine of $_.
trans-unit.target: 返回EXPR的正弦值（以弧度表示）。如果省略EXPR，则返回 $_ 正弦值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sine of EXPR (expressed in radians). If EXPR is omitted, returns sine of $_ .
trans-unit.target: 返回EXPR的正弦值（以弧度表示）。如果省略EXPR，则返回 $_ 正弦值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size in bytes for the given file as stored on the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在远程服务器上的指定文件的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of a file pointed to by $win32Handle, optionally storing the high order 32 bits into $iSizeHigh if it is not []. If $iSizeHigh is [], a non-zero value indicates success. Otherwise, on failure the return value will be 0xffffffff and fileLastError() will not be NO_ERROR.
trans-unit.target: 返回 $win32Handle 指向的文件的大小，如果不是 [] ，则可以选择将高阶32位存储到 $iSizeHigh 。如果$ iSizeHigh为 [] ，则非零值表示成功。否则，失败时返回值将为 0xffffffff ,而 fileLastError() 不会为 NO_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the string buffer in the SV, not including any part attributable to SvOOK . See SvCUR .
trans-unit.target: 返回SV中字符串缓冲区的大小，不包括 SvOOK 的任何部分。参见 SvCUR 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the string buffer in the SV, not including any part attributable to SvOOK. See "SvCUR".
trans-unit.target: 返回SV中字符串缓冲区的大小，不包括归因于 SvOOK 的任何部分。参见 "SvCUR" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest part of the FQDN which can be used to identify the host.
trans-unit.target: 返回FQDN的最小部分,它可以用来识别主机。

trans-unit.source: Returns the square root of OBJ, truncated to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回OBJ的平方根,截断为一个整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the stack size for a particular thread. A return value of zero indicates the system default stack size was used for the thread.
trans-unit.target: 返回特定线程的堆栈大小。返回值为0时表示该线程使用了系统默认的堆栈大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns the starting op of the main part of the Perl program.
trans-unit.target: 返回Perl程序主要部分的起始操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the stash of the CV. A stash is the symbol table hash, containing the package-scoped variables in the package where the subroutine was defined. For more information, see perlguts.
trans-unit.target: 返回CV的存储。存储是符号表哈希，包含定义了子例程的包中包范围的变量。有关更多信息，请参见perlguts。

trans-unit.source: Returns the stash of the SV.
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的储藏。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string at %s line %d, where %s is replaced with the filename, and %d is replaced with the line number.
trans-unit.target: 返回 at %s line %d 的字符串，其中 %s 被替换为文件名，而 %d 被替换为行号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the stringified form of the values in the list, subject to the configuration options below. The values will be named $VAR
trans-unit.target: 根据以下配置选项，返回列表中值的字符串化形式。这些值将命名为 $VAR

trans-unit.source: Returns the stringified form of the values stored in the object (preserving the order in which they were supplied to new ), subject to the configuration options below. In a list context, it returns a list of strings corresponding to the supplied values.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在对象中的值的字符串形式（保留将它们提供给 new 的顺序），但要遵循以下配置选项。在列表上下文中，它返回与提供的值相对应的字符串列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the stringified form of the values stored in the object (preserving the order in which they were supplied to new), subject to the configuration options below. In a list context, it returns a list of strings corresponding to the supplied values.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在对象中的值的字符串形式（保留它们提供给 new 的顺序），但要遵循以下配置选项。在列表上下文中，它返回与提供的值相对应的字符串列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sum of the base 10 digits.
trans-unit.target: 返回10位基数的和。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sum of two Benchmark times as a Benchmark object suitable for passing to timestr().
trans-unit.target: 返回两个Benchmark时间之和,作为Benchmark对象,适合传递给 timestr()。

trans-unit.source: Returns the system identifier for the semaphore set.
trans-unit.target: 返回旗语集的系统标识。

trans-unit.source: Returns the system message queue identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统消息队列标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the test plan, if found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到,返回测试计划。

trans-unit.source: Returns the tests for a given generation. This is a hashref or a hash, depending on context called. The keys to the hash are the individual test names and the value is a hashref with various interesting values. Each k/v pair might resemble something like this:
trans-unit.target: 返回给定世代的测试。这是一个hashref或hash,取决于调用的上下文。哈希的键是各个测试的名称,值是一个包含各种有趣值的哈希。每个k/v对可能类似于这样。

trans-unit.source: Returns the text message returned from the last command. In a scalar context it returns a single string, in a list context it will return each line as a separate element. (See "PSEUDO RESPONSES" below.)
trans-unit.target: 返回上一条命令返回的文本消息。在标量上下文中，它返回单个字符串，在列表上下文中，它将每行作为单独的元素返回。（请参阅下面的“伪回应”。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the text message returned from the last command. In a scalar context it returns a single string, in a list context it will return each line as a separate element. (See PSEUDO RESPONSES below.)
trans-unit.target: 返回上一条命令返回的文本消息。在标量上下文中，它返回单个字符串，在列表上下文中，它将每行作为单独的元素返回。（请参阅下面的“ PSEUDO RESPONSES”。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the thread identifier of the calling thread. Until the thread terminates, the thread identifier uniquely identifies the thread throughout the system.
trans-unit.target: 返回调用线程的线程标识符。在线程终止之前,线程标识符在整个系统中唯一地标识该线程。

trans-unit.source: Returns the thread object to allow for method chaining:
trans-unit.target: 返回允许方法链的线程对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of bytes compressed bytes input to inflate.
trans-unit.target: 返回要膨胀的输入压缩字节总数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of bytes uncompressed bytes input to deflate.
trans-unit.target: 返回要放气的未压缩字节的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of compressed bytes output from deflate.
trans-unit.target: 返回deflate输出的压缩字节总数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of items in the tied array associated with object
trans-unit.target: 返回与对象相关联的绑定数组中的项目总数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of tests run.
trans-unit.target: 返回运行的测试总数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of uncompressed bytes output from inflate.
trans-unit.target: 返回 inflate输出的未压缩字节总数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the trimmed name which was generated from $name by a previous call to addsym(), or undef if $name is not a member of this set of symbols. This method must be called via an existing object.
trans-unit.target: 返回由先前对addsym（）的调用从 $name 生成的修剪后的名称，如果 $name 不是该符号集的成员，则返回 undef 。必须通过现有对象调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of result, such as comment or test .
trans-unit.target: 返回结果的类型，例如 comment 或 test 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of result, such as comment or test.
trans-unit.target: 返回结果的类型，例如 comment 或 test 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the SV. See "svtype".
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的类型。请参见 "svtype" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the SV. See svtype .
trans-unit.target: 返回SV的类型。参见 svtype 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the link; one of: "url" for things like http://www.foo, "man" for man pages, or "pod".
trans-unit.target: 返回链接的类型；其中之一： "url" 代表 http://www.foo ， "man" 代表手册页，或 "pod" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the uncompressed file offset.
trans-unit.target: 返回未压缩文件的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the undefined value if the array is empty, although this may also happen at other times. If ARRAY is omitted, pops the @ARGV array in the main program, but the @_ array in subroutines, just like shift.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组为空，则返回未定义的值，尽管这可能在其他时间也会发生。如果省略了ARRAY，则在主程序中弹出 @ARGV 数组，但在子例程中弹出 @_ 数组，就像 shift 一样。

trans-unit.source: Returns the undefined value if the array is empty, although this may also happen at other times. If ARRAY is omitted, pops the @ARGV array in the main program, but the @_ array in subroutines, just like shift.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组为空，则返回未定义的值，尽管这可能在其他时间也会发生。如果省略了ARRAY，则在主程序中弹出 @ARGV 数组，但在子例程中弹出 @_ 数组，就像 shift 一样。

trans-unit.source: Returns the undefined value if the array is empty, although this may also happen at other times. If ARRAY is omitted, pops the @ARGV array in the main program, but the @_ array in subroutines, just like shift.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组为空，则返回未定义的值，尽管这可能在其他时间也会发生。如果省略了ARRAY，则在主程序中弹出 @ARGV 数组，但在子例程中弹出 @_ 数组，就像 shift 一样。

trans-unit.source: Returns the user's identifier. Identical to Perl's builtin $< variable, see "$UID" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户的标识符。与Perl的内置 $< 变量相同，请参见perlvar中的“ $ UID”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the user's identifier. Identical to Perl's builtin $< variable, see $UID in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户的标识符。与Perl的内置 $< 变量相同，请参见perlvar中的$ UID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the user's real group identifier. Similar to Perl's builtin variable $) , see $GID in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户的真实组标识符。与Perl的内置变量 $) 类似，请参阅perlvar中的$ GID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the user's real group identifier. Similar to Perl's builtin variable $), see "$GID" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户的真实组标识符。与Perl的内置变量 $) 类似，请参见perlvar中的“ $ GID”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value from the current position of the hash iterator. See "hv_iterkey".
trans-unit.target: 从哈希迭代器的当前位置返回值。参见 "hv_iterkey" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value from the current position of the hash iterator. See hv_iterkey .
trans-unit.target: 从哈希迭代器的当前位置返回值。参见 hv_iterkey 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of $num taken to the power $exp in the modulus $mod using binary exponentiation. bmodpow is far superior to writing
trans-unit.target: 使用二进制幂返回模数 $mod 幂 $exp 的 $num 值。 bmodpow 远胜于写作

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of EXPR with all the ASCII non-"word" characters backslashed. (That is, all ASCII characters not matching /[A-Za-z_0-9]/ will be preceded by a backslash in the returned string, regardless of any locale settings.) This is the internal function implementing the \Q escape in double-quoted strings. (See below for the behavior on non-ASCII code points.)
trans-unit.target: 返回带有反斜杠的所有ASCII非“ word”字符的EXPR值。（也就是说，无论任何语言环境设置如何，所有不匹配 /[A-Za-z_0-9]/ 的 ASCII字符都将在返回的字符串前加反斜杠。）这是内部实现 \Q 转义的内部函数引号的字符串。（有关非ASCII代码点的行为，请参见下文。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of EXPR with the first character in uppercase (titlecase in Unicode). This is the internal function implementing the \u escape in double-quoted strings.
trans-unit.target: 返回EXPR的值，第一个字符为大写（Unicode标题为大写）。这是在双引号字符串中实现 \u 转义的内部函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of EXPR with the first character lowercased. This is the internal function implementing the \l escape in double-quoted strings.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一个字符小写的EXPR值。这是在双引号字符串中实现 \l 转义的内部函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of a symbolic link, if symbolic links are implemented. If not, raises an exception. If there is a system error, returns the undefined value and sets $! (errno). If EXPR is omitted, uses $_.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现了符号链接，则返回符号链接的值。如果不是，则引发异常。如果出现系统错误，则返回未定义的值并设置 $! （errno）。如果省略EXPR，则使用 $_ 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of a symbolic link, if symbolic links are implemented. If not, raises an exception. If there is a system error, returns the undefined value and sets $! (errno). If EXPR is omitted, uses $_ .
trans-unit.target: 如果实现了符号链接，则返回符号链接的值。如果不是，则引发异常。如果出现系统错误，则返回未定义的值并设置 $! （errno）。如果省略EXPR，则使用 $_ 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of an ASCII-range hex digit and advances the string pointer. Behaviour is only well defined when isXDIGIT(*str) is true.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个ASCII码范围内的十六进制数字的值,并推进字符串指针。只有当isXDIGIT(*str)为真时,行为才会被很好地定义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of errno.
trans-unit.target: 返回errno的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the IV,
trans-unit.target: 返回IV的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the object's reference count.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的引用次数的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the object's reference count. Exposed to perl code via Internals::SvREFCNT().
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的引用次数的值。通过Internals::SvREFCNT()暴露给perl代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified environment variable. The same information is available through the %ENV array.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定环境变量的值。可通过 %ENV 阵列获得相同的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value slot (type SV* ) stored in the hash entry. Can be assigned to.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在哈希条目中的值槽（类型 SV* ）。可以分配给。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value slot (type SV*) stored in the hash entry. Can be assigned to.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在哈希条目中的值槽（类型 SV* ）。可以分配给。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value used by the constructor, and passed to IO::Socket::INET, to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 返回构造函数使用的值,并传递给IO::Socket::INET,以连接到主机。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value used by the constructor, and passed to the IO::Socket super class to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 返回构造函数使用的值,并传递给IO::Socket超级类以连接到主机。

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of the input in a random order
trans-unit.target: 按随机顺序返回输入值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of the semaphore set as an array.
trans-unit.target: 以数组形式返回旗语集的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version as defined by the $VERSION variable for the package as returned by the name method if no arguments are given. If given the name of a package it will attempt to return the version of that package if it is specified in the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出参数，则返回由 name 方法返回的包的$ VERSION变量定义的版本。如果给定了包的名称，则将尝试返回该包的版本（如果在文件中指定了该版本）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version number (a string) of the Unicode Standard which the table file used by the collator object is based on. If the table does not include a version line (starting with @version ), returns "unknown" .
trans-unit.target: 返回归类对象使用的 table 文件所基于的Unicode标准的版本号（字符串）。如果该表不包含版本行（以 @version 开头），则返回 "unknown" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version number (a string) of the Unicode Standard which the table file used by the collator object is based on. If the table does not include a version line (starting with @version), returns "unknown".
trans-unit.target: 返回归类对象使用的 table 文件所基于的Unicode标准的版本号（字符串）。如果该表不包含版本行（以 @version 开头），则返回 "unknown" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version number of UTS #10 this module consults, that should correspond with the DUCET incorporated.
trans-unit.target: 返回该模块所参考的UTS #10的版本号,该版本号应与纳入的DUCET对应。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version number of the available module in readable format.
trans-unit.target: 以可读格式返回可用模块的版本号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version number of the installed module in readable format.
trans-unit.target: 以可读格式返回安装模块的版本号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version of the underlying bzip2 library.
trans-unit.target: 返回底层bzip2库的版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version of the zlib library.
trans-unit.target: 返回zlib库的版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the wall-clock time when the Parser was created.
trans-unit.target: 返回创建Parser时的挂钟时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the wall-clock time when the end of TAP input was seen.
trans-unit.target: 返回看到TAP输入结束时的挂钟时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if
trans-unit.target: 如果

trans-unit.source: Returns true if $ref is a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $ref 是弱引用，则返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if $self->make is the given type; possibilities are:
trans-unit.target: 如果 $self->make 是给定的类型，则返回true；否则，返回true 。可能性是：

trans-unit.source: Returns true if $var is readonly.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $var 为只读，则返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if <$self- make>> is the given type; possibilities are:
trans-unit.target: 如果 <$self- make >>是给定类型，则返回true；否则，返回true 。可能性是：

trans-unit.source: Returns true if Archive::Tar can extract bzip2 compressed archives
trans-unit.target: 如果 Archive::Tar 可以提取 bzip2 压缩的归档文件，则返回true

trans-unit.source: Returns true if Archive::Tar can extract xz compressed archives
trans-unit.target: 如果 Archive::Tar 可以提取 xz 压缩的存档，则返回true

trans-unit.source: Returns true if Archive::Tar can extract zlib compressed archives
trans-unit.target: 如果 Archive::Tar 可以提取 zlib 压缩的归档文件，则返回true

trans-unit.source: Returns true if Compress::Zlib is available. Note that this does not mean that Compress::Zlib is being used: see "gzip_external" and gzip_used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Compress::Zlib 可用，则返回true 。请注意，这并不意味着正在使用 Compress::Zlib ：请参见“ gzip_external”和gzip_used。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if Compress::Zlib is available. Note that this does not mean that Compress::Zlib is being used: see gzip_external and gzip_used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Compress::Zlib 可用，则返回true 。请注意，这并不意味着正在使用 Compress::Zlib ：请参见gzip_external和gzip_used。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if arg is subject to overloading of some operations.
trans-unit.target: 如果 arg 承受某些操作的重载，则返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if make can handle (probably by quoting) dependencies that contain a space. Currently known true for GNU make, false for BSD pmake derivative.
trans-unit.target: 如果 make 可以处理（可能通过引用）包含空格的依赖项，则返回true 。目前已知对GNU make为true，对于BSD pmake派生为false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if o has a sibling
trans-unit.target: 如果 o 有同级，则返回true

trans-unit.source: Returns true if C, XS, MYEXTLIB or similar objects exist within this object that need a compiler. Does not descend into subdirectories as needs_linking() does.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个对象中存在C、XS、MYEXTLIB或类似的对象需要编译器,则返回true。不像 needs_linking()那样,将编译器下放到子目录中。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if MODULE is marked as deprecated in PERL_VERSION. If PERL_VERSION is omitted, it defaults to the current version of Perl.
trans-unit.target: 如果在PERL_VERSION中MODULE被标记为废弃,则返回true。如果PERL_VERSION被省略,则默认为当前Perl的版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if MODULE was bundled with the specified version of Perl. You can optionally specify a minimum version of the module, and can also specify a version of Perl. If a version of Perl isn't specified, is_core() will use the numeric version of Perl that is running (ie $] ).
trans-unit.target: 如果MODULE与指定版本的Perl捆绑在一起，则返回true。您可以选择指定模块的最低版本，也可以指定Perl的版本。如果未指定Perl版本，则 is_core() 将使用正在运行的Perl的数字版本（即 $] ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if MODULE was bundled with the specified version of Perl. You can optionally specify a minimum version of the module, and can also specify a version of Perl. If a version of Perl isn't specified, is_core() will use the numeric version of Perl that is running (ie $]).
trans-unit.target: 如果MODULE与指定版本的Perl捆绑在一起，则返回true。您可以选择指定模块的最低版本，也可以指定Perl的版本。如果未指定Perl版本，则 is_core() 将使用正在运行的Perl的数字版本（即 $] ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if a backtrace could be retrieved, false if not.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以检索到回溯,则返回true,如果不能,则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if a thread is still running (i.e., if its entry point function has not yet finished or exited).
trans-unit.target: 如果一个线程仍在运行,则返回true(即,如果它的入口点函数尚未完成或退出)。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if all copies succeeded, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有副本成功,则返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if all moves succeeded, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有动作都成功,则返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if and only if $x is equal to $y, and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果且仅如果$x等于$y,返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if and only if $x is greater than $y, and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果且仅当$x大于$y时返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if and only if $x is greater than or equal to $y, and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果且仅当$x大于或等于$y时返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if and only if $x is less than or equal to $y, and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果且仅当$x小于或等于$y时返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if and only if $x is not equal to $y, and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果且仅如果$x不等于$y,返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if implementation has a buffer, and can return pointer to whole buffer and its size. Used by perl for -T / -B tests. Other uses would be very obscure...
trans-unit.target: 如果实现具有缓冲区，则返回true，并且可以返回指向整个缓冲区及其大小的指针。由perl用于-T / -B测试。其他用途将非常晦涩...

trans-unit.source: Returns true if implementation has all the interfaces required to allow perl's sv_gets to "bypass" normal IO mechanism. This can vary from handle to handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现具有允许perl的 sv_gets “绕过”常规IO机制所需的所有接口，则返回true 。这可能因手柄而异。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if it is valid, false if not.
trans-unit.target: 如果有效则返回true,如果无效则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if o has a sibling
trans-unit.target: 如果o有兄弟姐妹,返回true。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if perl thinks $var is a number. See looks_like_number in perlapi.
trans-unit.target: 如果perl认为 $var 是一个数字，则返回true 。参见perlapi中的looks_like_number。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if perl thinks $var is a number. See "looks_like_number" in perlapi.
trans-unit.target: 如果perl认为 $var 是一个数字，则返回true 。参见perlapi中的“ looks_like_number”。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if some new text was added to the buffer, or false if the buffer has reached the end of the input text.
trans-unit.target: 如果有新的文本被添加到缓冲区,则返回true;如果缓冲区已经到达输入文本的终点,则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功返回true。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the close method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 如果已调用 close 方法，则返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the close method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 如果已调用 close 方法，则返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the SV has a true value by Perl's rules. Use the SvTRUE macro instead, which may call sv_true() or may instead use an in-line version.
trans-unit.target: 如果SV根据Perl的规则具有true值，则返回true。请改用 SvTRUE 宏，它可以调用 sv_true() 或改用嵌入式版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the SV has get magic or overloading. If either is true then the scalar is active data, and has the potential to return a new value every time it is accessed. Hence you must be careful to only read it once per user logical operation and work with that returned value. If neither is true then the scalar's value cannot change unless written to.
trans-unit.target: 如果SV有get magic或overloading,则返回true。如果其中之一为真,那么这个标量就是活动数据,并且有可能在每次访问时返回一个新的值。因此,你必须注意每个用户逻辑操作只读取一次,并使用该返回值工作。如果两者都不为真,那么标量的值就不能改变,除非写入。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the argument is NaN (not-a-number) [C99].
trans-unit.target: 如果参数为 NaN （非数字）[C99]，则返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the argument is a compiled regular expression as returned by qr//, false if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是 qr// 返回的已编译正则表达式，则返回true；否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the argument is a compiled regular expression as returned by qr//, false if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是 qr// 返回的已编译正则表达式，则返回true；否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the argument is a finite number (that is, not an infinity, or the not-a-number) [C99].
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是一个有限的数(即不是无穷大,或者不是一个数),则返回true[C99]。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the argument is an infinity (positive or negative) [C99].
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是无穷大(正或负),返回true[C99]。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the argument is normal (that is, not a subnormal/denormal, and not an infinity, or a not-a-number) [C99].
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是正常的(也就是说,不是次正常/正态,也不是无穷大,或者不是一个数),返回true[C99]。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the argument is readonly, otherwise returns false. Exposed to perl code via Internals::SvREADONLY().
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是只读的,则返回true,否则返回false.通过Internals::SvREADONLY()向perl代码公开。通过Internals::SvREADONLY()暴露给perl代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the context of the currently executing subroutine or eval is looking for a list value. Returns false if the context is looking for a scalar. Returns the undefined value if the context is looking for no value (void context).
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在执行的子例程或 eval 的上下文正在寻找列表值，则返回true 。如果上下文正在寻找标量，则返回false。如果上下文不寻找任何值（无效上下文），则返回未定义的值。
